cards.name: Aerial Assault
cards.text: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.
cards.flavor:
"Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Aerial Assault tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain life. If the target is legal but is not destroyed (most likely because it has indestructible), you will gain life.
Any abilities that trigger as the target creature is destroyed won’t resolve until after you’ve gained life.
If any creatures were exiled “until” the target creature left the battlefield, those creatures will return before you gain life.

cards.name: Ajani, Strength of the Pride
cards.text:
[+1]: You gain life equal to the number of creatures you control plus the number of planeswalkers you control.
[−2]: Create a 2/2 white Cat Soldier creature token named Ajani's Pridemate with "Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate."
[0]: If you have at least 15 life more than your starting life total, exile Ajani, Strength of the Pride and each artifact and creature your opponents control.

rulings.text: If a planeswalker you control is also a creature (most likely because it’s Gideon), it will be counted twice as Ajani’s first ability resolves.
The tokens created by Ajani’s second ability are similar to the card Ajani’s Pridemate, but they have no mana cost and their mana value is 0.
If Ajani’s Pridemate is dealt lethal damage at the same time that you gain life, it won’t receive a counter from its ability in time to save it.

The ability of Ajani’s Pridemate triggers just once for each life-gaining event, whether it’s 1 life from Impassioned Orator or 4 life from Dawning Angel. If you gain an amount of life “for each” of something or “equal to the number” of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability of Ajani’s Pridemate triggers only once.

Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, Ajani’s Pridemate’s ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
Whether you have at least 15 life more than your starting life total is determined as Ajani’s last ability resolves.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won’t cause Ajani’s Pridemate’s ability to trigger, even though it will cause your team’s life total to increase.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Ajani’s last ability exiles permanents as long as your team’s life total is greater than your team’s starting life total by 15 or more life.

cards.name: Ancestral Blade
cards.text:
When Ancestral Blade enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then attach Ancestral Blade to it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: The Soldier token that you create enters the battlefield as a 1/1 creature. Any abilities that trigger when a creature with a certain power enters the battlefield will see the token enter as a 1/1 creature. Static abilities that affect the Soldier's power and toughness may change this, but Ancestral Blade will be attached to the Soldier before the game checks to see if it has toughness 0 or less. For example, if Illness in the Ranks (“Creature tokens get -1/-1”) is on the battlefield, the Soldier will enter as a 0/0 creature, but then Ancestral Blade will make it a 1/1 and the token will survive.
No player may take any actions between the time you create the Soldier token and the time Ancestral Blade becomes attached to it.
If the triggered ability causes two Soldiers to be created (due to an effect such as that of Doubling Season), Ancestral Blade becomes attached to one of them.

cards.name: Angel of Vitality
cards.text:
Flying
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
Angel of Vitality gets +2/+2 as long as you have 25 or more life.

rulings.text: If you control two Angels of Vitality and you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 2. A third Angel of Vitality has you gain that much life plus 3, and so on.

The middle ability of Angel of Vitality applies just once to each life-gaining event, whether it’s 1 life from Impassioned Orator or 4 life from Dawning Angel. If you gain an amount of life “for each” of something or “equal to the number” of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability of Angel of Vitality applies only once.

Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, Angel of Vitality’s second ability will apply twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will apply only once.

If Angel of Vitality is dealt damage and your life total is increased above 25 before state-based actions are performed (most likely because Angel of Vitality is dealt combat damage at the same time that a creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage), Angel of Vitality’s last ability applies before checking whether it’s destroyed for having lethal damage marked on it.
Because damage remains marked on a creature until it’s removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to Angel of Vitality may become lethal if your life total drops below 25 during that turn.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won’t cause Angel of Vitality’s second ability to apply, even though it will cause your team’s life total to increase.
In multiplayer formats where your life total doesn’t start at 20, Angel of Vitality’s last ability still applies if your life total is 25 or more.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Angel of Vitality’s last ability applies as long as your team’s life total is 25 or more.

cards.name: Brought Back
cards.text: Choose up to two target permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor:
"As long as your courage remains, your life will not falter."
—Sephara, Sky's Blade

rulings.text: A permanent card is an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card.

If you return an Aura this way, you choose what the Aura will enchant just before it enters the battlefield, but you can’t choose any permanent cards that will enter the battlefield at the same time as that Aura. An Aura returning to the battlefield this way doesn’t target the player or permanent it will enchant, so permanents or players with hexproof may be chosen; however, the chosen recipient must be able to legally be enchanted by the Aura, so a player or permanent with protection from one of the Aura’s qualities can’t be chosen this way. If there’s nothing legal for the Aura to enchant, it stays in the graveyard.
Permanent spells that were countered earlier in the turn never entered the battlefield, so they won’t be legal targets for Brought Back.

cards.name: Cavalier of Dawn
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Cavalier of Dawn enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
When Cavalier of Dawn dies, return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: You may put Cavalier of Dawn’s enters-the-battlefield ability onto the stack without choosing any target. It will resolve with no effect. However, if you do choose a target and the target permanent is an illegal target by the time that ability tries to resolve, the ability won’t resolve. No player will create a Golem token. If the target is legal but not destroyed (most likely because it has indestructible), its controller will create a Golem token.

foreignNames.name: Reiter der Morgenröte
foreignNames.text:
Wachsamkeit
Wenn der Reiter der Morgenröte ins Spiel kommt, zerstöre bis zu eine bleibende Nichtland-Karte deiner Wahl. Ihr Beherrscher erzeugt einen 3/3 farblosen Golem-Artefaktkreaturenspielstein.
Wenn der Reiter der Morgenröte stirbt, bringe eine Artefakt- oder Verzauberungskarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignNames.name: Caballero del amanecer
foreignNames.text:
Vigilancia.
Cuando el Caballero del amanecer entre al campo de batalla, destruye hasta un permanente objetivo que no sea tierra. Su controlador crea una ficha de criatura artefacto Gólem incolora 3/3.
Cuando el Caballero del amanecer muera, regresa la carta de artefacto o de encantamiento objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.

foreignNames.name: Cavalier de l'aube
foreignNames.text:
Vigilance
Quand le Cavalier de l'aube arrive sur le champ de bataille, détruisez jusqu'à un permanent non-terrain ciblé. Son contrôleur crée un jeton de créature-artefact 3/3 incolore Golem.
Quand le Cavalier de l'aube meurt, renvoyez une carte d'artefact ou d'enchantement ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.

foreignNames.name: Cavalcante dell'Alba
foreignNames.text:
Cautela
Quando il Cavalcante dell'Alba entra nel campo di battaglia, distruggi fino a un permanente non terra bersaglio. Il suo controllore crea una pedina creatura artefatto Golem 3/3 incolore.
Quando il Cavalcante dell'Alba muore, riprendi in mano una carta artefatto o incantesimo bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignNames.name: 暁の騎兵
foreignNames.text:
警戒
暁の騎兵が戦場に出たとき、土地でないパーマネント最大１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。それのコントローラーは無色の３/３のゴーレム・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
暁の騎兵が死亡したとき、あなたの墓地からアーティファクトかエンチャントであるカード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル・騎士

foreignNames.name: 여명의 기수
foreignNames.text:
경계
여명의 기수가 전장에 들어올 때, 대지가 아닌 지속물을 최대 한 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 파괴한다. 그 지속물의 조종자는 3/3 무색 골렘 마법물체 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
여명의 기수가 죽을 때, 당신의 무덤에 있는 마법물체 또는 부여마법 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Cavaleiro da Aurora
foreignNames.text:
Vigilância
Quando Cavaleiro da Aurora entrar no campo de batalha, destrua até uma permanente alvo que não seja um terreno. Seu controlador cria uma ficha de criatura artefato incolor 3/3 do tipo Golem.
Quando Cavaleiro da Aurora morrer, devolva o card de artefato ou encantamento alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.

foreignNames.name: Всадник Рассвета
foreignNames.text:
Бдительность
Когда Всадник Рассвета выходит на поле битвы, уничтожьте не более одного целевого перманента, не являющегося землей. Контролирующий его игрок создает одну фишку артефакта существа 3/3 бесцветный Голем.
Когда Всадник Рассвета умирает, верните целевую карту артефакта или чар из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.

foreignNames.name: 曙光骁骑
foreignNames.text:
警戒
当曙光骁骑进战场时，消灭至多一个目标非地永久物。其操控者派出一个3/3无色魔像衍生神器生物。
当曙光骁骑死去时，将目标神器或结界牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

foreignNames.name: 曙光驍騎
foreignNames.text:
警戒
當曙光驍騎進戰場時，消滅至多一個目標非地永久物。其操控者派出一個3/3無色魔像衍生神器生物。
當曙光驍騎死去時，將目標神器或結界牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。

cards.originalText:
Vigilance
When Cavalier of Dawn enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
When Cavalier of Dawn dies, return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Dawning Angel
cards.text:
Flying
When Dawning Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
cards.flavor:
"As the sun rose behind the Bone Spire, an angel appeared over the charnel fields, bringing a surge of new hope."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*

foreignNames.name: Morgenrot-Engel
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Morgenrot-Engel ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 4 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Als die Sonne über der Knochenspitze aufging, erschien ein Engel über den mit Leichen übersäten Feldern und brachte einen Schwall neuer Hoffnung."
—Krinnea, *Belagerung der Knochenspitze*

foreignNames.name: Ángel de la aurora
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Ángel de la aurora entre al campo de batalla, ganas 4 vidas.
foreignNames.flavor:
"En cuanto el sol se alzó por detrás de la Aguja Ósea, un ángel apareció sobre los campos sembrados de muerte; consigo traía la luz de una nueva esperanza".
—Krinnea, *El asedio de la Aguja Ósea*

foreignNames.name: Ange naissant
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand l'Ange naissant arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez 4 points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Tandis que le soleil s'élevait derrière la Tour d'Os, un ange apparut au-dessus des charniers, porteur d'un nouvel espoir. »
—Krinnea, *Siège de la Tour d'Os*

foreignNames.name: Angelo dell'Aurora
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando l'Angelo dell'Aurora entra nel campo di battaglia, guadagni 4 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Mentre sorgeva il sole dietro la Guglia d'Osso, un angelo comparve sui campi dell'ossario, portando un'ondata di nuova speranza."
—Krinnea, *L'Assedio della Guglia d'Osso*

foreignNames.name: 夜明けの天使
foreignNames.text:
飛行
夜明けの天使が戦場に出たとき、あなたは４点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 天使
foreignNames.flavor:
「骨塔の背後から太陽が昇り、死が埋め尽くす戦場に天使が降り立つと、新たな希望のうねりをもたらした。」
――クリネア著「*骨塔の包囲戦*」

foreignNames.name: 새벽녘 천사
foreignNames.text:
비행
새벽녘 천사가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생명 4점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"태양이 뼈 첨탑 뒤로 솟아오를 때, 천사 하나가 시체로 뒤덮인 들판 위로 나타나자, 새로운 희망이 솟구치듯 밀려들었다."
—크린네아, *뼈 첨탑의 공성전*

foreignNames.name: Anjo do Alvorecer
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Anjo do Alvorecer entra no campo de batalha, você ganha 4 pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Quando o sol nasceu por trás da Torre dos Ossos, um anjo surgiu sobre os campos funestos trazendo uma nova esperança."
— Krinnea, *Cerco da Torre dos Ossos*

foreignNames.name: Восходящий Ангел
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда Восходящий Ангел выходит на поле битвы, вы получаете 4 жизни.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Лучи восходящего за Каменным Шпилем солнца осветили ангела над полями смерти, и те, кто увидел его, преисполнились новой надежды».
— Криннея, *«Осада Каменного Шпиля»*

foreignNames.name: 拂晓天使
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当拂晓天使进战场时，你获得4点生命。
foreignNames.flavor:
「随着骨塔之后天空夜色渐散，天使偕同太阳破晓降临世间，将希望随着光芒洒向这片死气沉沉的大地。」
～柯琳娅，《骨塔围攻纪》**

foreignNames.name: 拂曉天使
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當拂曉天使進戰場時，你獲得4點生命。
foreignNames.flavor:
「隨著骨塔之後天空夜色漸散，天使偕同太陽破曉降臨世間，將希望隨著光芒灑向這片死氣沉沉的大地。」
～柯琳婭，《骨塔圍攻紀》**

cards.originalText:
Flying
When Dawning Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

cards.name: Daybreak Chaplain
cards.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: "May the light shine through me to guide the lost."

foreignNames.name: Kaplanin der Morgendämmerung
foreignNames.text: Lebensverknüpfung (Schaden, der von dieser Kreatur zugefügt wird, lässt dich entsprechend viele Lebenspunkte dazuerhalten.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Möge das Licht durch mich scheinen und den Verlorenen den Weg weisen."

foreignNames.name: Capellana del amanecer
foreignNames.text: Vínculo vital. (El daño hecho por esta criatura también hace que ganes esa misma cantidad de vidas.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Que la luz resplandezca a través de mí y guíe a aquellos que se perdieron".

foreignNames.name: Aumônière du point du jour
foreignNames.text: Lien de vie (Les blessures infligées par cette créature vous font aussi gagner autant de points de vie.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Puisse la lumière éclairer à travers moi ceux qui se sont égarés. »

foreignNames.name: Cappellana dell'Aurora
foreignNames.text: Legame vitale (Il danno inflitto da questa creatura ti fa anche guadagnare altrettanti punti vita.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Che la luce possa splendere attraverso di me per guidare chi è perduto."

foreignNames.name: 夜明けの司祭
foreignNames.text: 絆魂（このクリーチャーがダメージを与えると、さらにあなたはその点数分のライフを得る。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック
foreignNames.flavor: 「私の発する光が迷える者を導かんことを。」

foreignNames.name: 여명의 사제
foreignNames.text: 생명연결 (이 생물이 피해를 입히면, 당신은 그 피해만큼의 생명점을 얻는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "나를 통해 길 잃은 자들을 인도할 빛을 비추소서."

foreignNames.name: Capelã do Raiar do Dia
foreignNames.text: Vínculo com a vida (O dano causado por esta criatura faz com que você ganhe uma quantidade equivalente de pontos de vida.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Que através de mim brilhe a luz para guiar os que se perderam."

foreignNames.name: Капеллан Рассвета
foreignNames.text: Цепь жизни (Повреждения, наносимые этим существом, также заставляют вас получить такое же количество жизней.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Пусть свет пройдет через меня, чтобы направить заблудившихся».

foreignNames.name: 破晓教士
foreignNames.text: 系命（此生物所造成的伤害会让你获得等量的生命。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「愿明光照我身，引领迷途之人。」

foreignNames.name: 破曉教士
foreignNames.text: 繫命（此生物所造成的傷害會讓你獲得等量的生命。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「願明光照我身，引領迷途之人。」

cards.originalText: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Devout Decree
cards.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker that's black or red. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
cards.flavor:
"It is not punishment. I am simply making things as they should be."
—Sephara, Sky's Blade

rulings.text: If the target creature or planeswalker is an illegal target by the time Devout Decree tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t scry 1.

foreignNames.name: Sakrales Dekret
foreignNames.text: Schicke eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl, die bzw. der schwarz oder rot ist, ins Exil. Hellsicht 1. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst sie unter deine Bibliothek legen.)
foreignNames.flavor:
„Dies ist keine Bestrafung. Ich sorge nur dafür, dass alles ist, wie es sein sollte."
—Sephara, Klinge des Himmels

foreignNames.name: Decreto de devoción
foreignNames.text: Exilia la criatura o planeswalker objetivo que sea negro o rojo. Adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"No es ningún castigo. Solo cambio las cosas para que sean como deben".
—Sephara, Acero Celestial

foreignNames.name: Décret fervent
foreignNames.text: Exilez une cible, créature ou planeswalker, noire ou rouge. Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez la mettre au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)
foreignNames.flavor:
« Ce n'est pas un châtiment. Je fais les choses comme elles devraient être. »
—Séphara, lame du ciel

foreignNames.name: Decreto Devoto
foreignNames.text: Esilia una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio di colore nero o rosso. Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"Non è una punizione. Sto semplicemente rendendo la realtà come dovrebbe essere."
—Sephara, Lama del Cielo

foreignNames.name: 敬虔な命令
foreignNames.text: 黒か赤の、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「これは懲罰ではありません。本来あるべき形に戻すのです。」
――天空の刃、セファラ

foreignNames.name: 신실한 칙령
foreignNames.text: 흑색 또는 적색인 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 추방한다. 점술 1을 한다. (당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"그건 벌이 아니다. 나는 단순히 그것들을 본연의 모습으로 만들어 줄 뿐이다."
—하늘의 검, 세파라

foreignNames.name: Decreto dos Devotos
foreignNames.text: Exile a criatura ou o planeswalker alvo preto ou vermelho. Vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"Não é punição. Estou simplesmente fazendo com que as coisas sejam como deveriam ser."
— Sephara, Lâmina dos Céus

foreignNames.name: Благочестивый Указ
foreignNames.text: Изгоните целевое красное или черное существо или planeswalker-а. Предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)
foreignNames.flavor:
«Это не наказание. Я просто делаю мир таким, каким он должен быть».
— Сефара, Клинок Небес

foreignNames.name: 虔诚裁决
foreignNames.text: 放逐目标黑色或红色的生物或鹏洛客。占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「这不是惩罚。我只是还原事物本貌。」
～驭空刃席斐拉

foreignNames.name: 虔誠裁決
foreignNames.text: 放逐目標黑色或紅色的生物或鵬洛客。占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「這不是懲罰。我只是還原事物本貌。」
～馭空刃席斐拉

cards.originalText: Exile target creature or planeswalker that's black or red. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Disenchant
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: Where the holy light of the angels has shone, only purity remains.

rulings.text: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

foreignNames.name: Entzauberung
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: Wo das heilige Licht der Engel geschienen hat, bleibt nur Reinheit zurück.

foreignNames.name: Desencantar
foreignNames.text: Destruye el artefacto o encantamiento objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Allá donde brilló la luz sagrada de los ángeles, solo queda la pureza.

foreignNames.name: Désenchantement
foreignNames.text: Détruisez l'artefact ciblé ou l'enchantement ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: Ce qui a été touché par la sainte lumière des anges ne connaît plus que la pureté.

foreignNames.name: Disincantare
foreignNames.text: Distruggi un artefatto o un incantesimo bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Ovunque abbia brillato la luce sacra degli angeli, resta solo purezza.

foreignNames.name: 解呪
foreignNames.text: アーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 天使の聖なる光が輝くところに残るのは純潔のみである。

foreignNames.name: 마법력 소거
foreignNames.text: 마법물체나 부여마법을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 천사들의 신성한 빛이 비춰진 곳에는 순수함만이 남는다.

foreignNames.name: Desencantar
foreignNames.text: Destrua o artefato ou encantamento alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Onde quer que brilhe a luz sagrada dos anjos permanece somente a pureza.

foreignNames.name: Разочарование
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевой артефакт или чары.
foreignNames.flavor: Там, где воссиял священный свет ангелов, остается только чистота.

foreignNames.name: 消除魔障
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标神器或结界。
foreignNames.flavor: 凡得天使圣光照耀之处，唯有纯净留存。

foreignNames.name: 消除魔障
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標神器或結界。
foreignNames.flavor: 凡得天使聖光照耀之處，唯有純淨留存。

cards.originalText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.name: Eternal Isolation
cards.text: Put target creature with power 4 or greater on the bottom of its owner's library.
cards.flavor: "Well, at least it's a lovely view."

foreignNames.name: Ewige Isolation
foreignNames.text: Lege eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Stärke 4 oder mehr unter die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wenigstens ist der Ausblick sehr schön."

foreignNames.name: Aislamiento eterno
foreignNames.text: Pon la criatura objetivo con fuerza de 4 o más en el fondo de la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Bueno, al menos la vista es hermosa".

foreignNames.name: Isolation éternelle
foreignNames.text: Mettez la créature de force supérieure ou égale à 4 ciblée au-dessous de la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: « Au moins, le paysage est beau. »

foreignNames.name: Isolamento Eterno
foreignNames.text: Metti una creatura bersaglio con forza pari o superiore a 4 in fondo al grimorio del suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Beh, almeno la vista è incantevole."

foreignNames.name: 永遠の疎外
foreignNames.text: パワーが４以上であるクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーのライブラリーの一番下に置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「まぁ、少なくとも眺めは良いな。」

foreignNames.name: 영원한 격리
foreignNames.text: 공격력이 4 이상인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 소유자의 서고 맨 밑에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "뭐, 최소한 아름다운 광경이잖아."

foreignNames.name: Isolamento Eterno
foreignNames.text: Coloque a criatura alvo com poder igual ou superior a 4 no fundo do grimório de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: "Bem, pelo menos a vista é agradável."

foreignNames.name: Вечное Одиночество
foreignNames.text: Положите целевое существо с силой 4 или больше в низ библиотеки его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: «Ну, хотя бы вид отсюда хороший».

foreignNames.name: 永生隔绝
foreignNames.text: 将目标力量等于或大于4的生物置于其拥有者的牌库底。
foreignNames.flavor: 「至少景色还不错。」

foreignNames.name: 永生隔絕
foreignNames.text: 將目標力量等於或大於4的生物置於其擁有者的牌庫底。
foreignNames.flavor: 「至少景色還不錯。」

cards.originalText: Put target creature with power 4 or greater on the bottom of its owner's library.

cards.name: Fencing Ace
cards.text: Double strike
cards.flavor: "Go find yourself a couple of friends, and bring me a blindfold. Then we might have a fair fight."

foreignNames.name: Spitzenfechter
foreignNames.text: Doppelschlag (Diese Kreatur fügt sowohl Erstschlags- als auch normalen Kampfschaden zu.)

cards.name: Gauntlets of Light
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
Enchanted creature has "{2}{W}: Untap this creature."

rulings.text: Gauntlets of Light’s effect doesn’t change the enchanted creature’s power; it changes only the amount of combat damage that creature assigns. All other rules and effects that check power or toughness use the actual values. For example, if a creature fights while enchanted by Gauntlets of Light, that creature will deal damage equal to its power, not its toughness.

cards.name: Gods Willing
cards.text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
Scry 1.

rulings.text: You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You choose the color as Gods Willing resolves. Once the color is chosen, it's too late for players to respond.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability's targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't scry.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you'll scry last. For others, that means you'll scry and then perform other actions.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You can't choose “artifact” or “colorless” as Gods Willing asks you to choose a color because those are not colors.

If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Gods Willing tries to resolve, the spell doesn't resolve. You won't scry 1. If the target creature becomes an illegal target while Gods Willing is resolving (most likely because you gave it protection from white), you do scry 1.

rulings.text: A player’s “opening hand” is the hand of cards the player has after all players have taken mulligans. If players have any cards in hand that allow actions to be taken with them from a player’s opening hand, the starting player takes all such actions first in any order, followed by each other player in turn order. Then the first turn begins.

cards.name: Loxodon Lifechanter
cards.text:
When Loxodon Lifechanter enters the battlefield, you may have your life total become the total toughness of creatures you control.
{5}{W}: Loxodon Lifechanter gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is your life total.

rulings.text: You can activate Loxodon Lifechanter’s last ability after it has entered the battlefield but before its first ability has resolved.

You choose whether to change your life total and, if you choose to do so, you set your life total to the appropriate number while Loxodon Lifechanter’s triggered ability is resolving. No player may take any actions between the time you choose to set your life total and the time your life total changes.

For your life total to become a certain number, you gain or lose the corresponding amount of life. For example, if your life total is 4 when the ability resolves and your creatures have a total of 6 toughness, the ability will cause you to gain 2 life; alternatively, if your life total is 10 when the ability resolves, it will cause you to lose 4 life if you choose to change your life total. Other cards that interact with life gain or life loss will interact with this effect accordingly.
If you set your life total to become equal to the toughness of creatures you control, this happens once. If the toughness of your creatures changes later, it won’t affect your life total.
The value of X is determined only as Loxodon Lifechanter’s last ability begins to resolve. It won’t change later in the turn if your life total changes.

cards.name: Loyal Pegasus
cards.text:
Flying
Loyal Pegasus can't attack or block alone.
cards.flavor:
"Even if I should die in the saddle, she will not let me fall to the ground."
—Hypatia of the Winged Horse

rulings.text: If you control more than one Loyal Pegasus, they can attack or block together, even if no other creatures attack or block.

Although Loyal Pegasus can’t attack alone, other attacking creatures don’t have to attack the same player or planeswalker. For example, Loyal Pegasus could attack an opponent and another creature could attack a planeswalker that opponent controls. Similarly, other blocking creatures don’t have to block the same creature that Loyal Pegasus blocks.
Once Loyal Pegasus has attacked or blocked, it will remain in combat even if you no longer control another attacking or blocking creature.

If an effect says that Loyal Pegasus attacks or blocks “if able,” and you control one or more other creatures that are able to attack or block, you must attack or block with Loyal Pegasus and at least one other creature.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Loyal Pegasus can attack or block with a creature controlled by your teammate, even if no other creatures you control are attacking or blocking.

cards.name: Rule of Law
cards.text: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.
cards.flavor: The law is meant to ensure that people kill each other with only the utmost fairness.

rulings.text: Rule of Law looks at the entire turn to see if a player has cast a spell, even if Rule of Law wasn’t on the battlefield when that spell was cast. Notably, you can’t cast Rule of Law and then cast another spell during the same turn.
If you cast a spell that was countered, you can’t cast another spell during the same turn.

cards.name: Sephara, Sky's Blade
cards.text:
You may pay {W} and tap four untapped creatures you control with flying rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Flying, lifelink
Other creatures you control with flying have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

rulings.text: To pay Sephara’s alternative cost, you may tap any untapped creatures you control with flying, including ones you haven’t controlled continuously since the beginning of your most recent turn.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying (such as Sephara’s alternative cost), add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

Because damage remains marked on a creature until it’s removed as the turn ends, lethal damage dealt to other creatures you control with flying may cause them to be destroyed if Sephara leaves the battlefield during that turn.

rulings.text: The owner of the target spell or permanent chooses to put it either on the top or bottom of their library.
If a spell is put into its owner’s library, it’s removed from the stack and thus will not resolve. The spell isn’t countered; it no longer exists. This works against a spell that can’t be countered.

cards.name: Agent of Treachery
cards.text:
When Agent of Treachery enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more permanents you don't own, draw three cards.
cards.flavor: "The more secrets you have, the more easily you become my pawn."

rulings.text: Gaining control of a creature doesn’t cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it. Gaining control of an Aura or Equipment doesn’t change what it’s currently attached to.

Agent of Treachery’s effect lasts indefinitely. It doesn’t wear off during the cleanup step, and it doesn’t expire if Agent of Treachery leaves the battlefield. In a multiplayer game, it does expire if you leave the game.
A token’s owner is the player who created it.

If you don’t control three permanents you don’t own as your end step begins, Agent of Treachery’s last ability doesn’t trigger. If you no longer control three permanents you don’t own as it resolves, you won’t draw three cards. Those don’t have to be the same three permanents each time.

If you gain control of a permanent “until end of turn,” that effect will wear off during the cleanup step, after the end step. You’ll control that permanent while considering Agent of Treachery’s last ability.

cards.name: Air Elemental

cards.flavor: As the ship approached, the jade totem rose high overhead. Power rippled. Eyes of stone glowed and crackled. Out hissed a breath of the world, and a windstorm came alive.

foreignNames.name: Elementale dell'Aria

foreignNames.flavor: 船が近づくと、翡翠のトーテム像が頭上高く現れた。力の波動を感じた。石の目が光り緊張が高まった。それが息を一吹きすると、暴風が巻き起こった。

foreignNames.name: 공기의 정령

foreignNames.flavor: 배가 다가가자, 비취 토템이 머리 위로 높이 떠올랐다. 힘이 물결쳤다. 암석으로 된 눈이 빛나며 우지끈 소리를 냈다. 거대한 숨을 내쉬자, 폭풍이 일어났다.

foreignNames.name: Elemental do Ar

foreignNames.name: Элементаль Воздуха

foreignNames.flavor: Когда корабль приблизился к берегу, высоко в небо поднялся нефритовый тотем. Воздух задрожал от сгустившейся мощи. Каменные глаза засияли, затрещали разряды. С шумом вырвалось дыхание мира, и яростный ураган ожил.

foreignNames.name: 大气元素

cards.name: Atemsis, All-Seeing
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{U}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Whenever Atemsis, All-Seeing deals damage to an opponent, you may reveal your hand. If cards with at least six different mana values are revealed this way, that player loses the game.

rulings.text: Every Magic card has exactly one mana value. A card with no mana cost has a mana value of 0, and 0 can be one of the six mana values that count toward Atemsis’s ability.
If a card in your hand has {X} in its mana cost, the value of X is considered to be 0.
The mana value of a split card is determined by combining its two halves. For example, the mana value of Fire//Ice in your hand is 4.
If an effect causes you to play with your hand revealed, you can still reveal your hand as Atemsis’s last ability resolves. The ability works as normal.

foreignNames.name: Atemsis die Allsehende
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
{2}{U}, {T}: Ziehe zwei Karten und wirf dann eine Karte ab.

foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand le Cavalier des bourrasques arrive sur le champ de bataille, piochez trois cartes et mettez ensuite deux cartes de votre main au-dessus de votre bibliothèque dans l'ordre de votre choix.
Quand le Cavalier des bourrasques meurt, mélangez-le dans la bibliothèque de son propriétaire, puis regard 2.

foreignNames.name: Cavalcante delle Burrasche
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando il Cavalcante delle Burrasche entra nel campo di battaglia, pesca tre carte, poi metti due carte dalla tua mano in cima al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.
Quando il Cavalcante delle Burrasche muore, rimescolalo nel grimorio del suo proprietario, poi profetizza 2.

foreignNames.name: 風の騎兵
foreignNames.text:
飛行
風の騎兵が戦場に出たとき、カードを３枚引き、その後あなたの手札からカード２枚をあなたのライブラリーの一番上に望む順番で置く。
風の騎兵が死亡したとき、それをオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直し、その後占術２を行う。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル・騎士

foreignNames.name: 돌풍의 기수
foreignNames.text:
비행
돌풍의 기수가 전장에 들어올 때, 카드 세 장을 뽑은 후, 당신의 손에 있는 카드 두 장을 원하는 순서로 서고 맨 위에 놓는다.
돌풍의 기수가 죽을 때, 돌풍의 기수를 소유자의 서고에 섞어넣은 후, 점술 2를 한다.

foreignNames.name: Cavaleiro dos Vendavais
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Cavaleiro dos Vendavais entrar no campo de batalha, compre três cards e depois coloque dois cards de sua mão no topo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem.
Quando Cavaleiro dos Vendavais morrer, embaralhe-o no grimório de seu dono. Depois, use vidência 2.

foreignNames.name: Всадник Бурь
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда Всадник Бурь выходит на поле битвы, возьмите три карты, затем положите две карты из вашей руки на верх вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.
Когда Всадник Бурь умирает, втасуйте его в библиотеку его владельца, затем предскажите 2.

foreignNames.name: 烈风骁骑
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当烈风骁骑进战场时，抓三张牌，然后从你手上将两张牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。
当烈风骁骑死去时，将它洗入其拥有者的牌库，然后占卜2。

foreignNames.name: 烈風驍騎
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當烈風驍騎進戰場時，抽三張牌，然後從你手上將兩張牌以任意順序置於你的牌庫頂。
當烈風驍騎死去時，將它洗入其擁有者的牌庫，然後占卜2。

cards.originalText:
Flying
When Cavalier of Gales enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
When Cavalier of Gales dies, shuffle it into its owner's library, then scry 2.

cards.name: Cerulean Drake
cards.text:
Flying
Protection from red (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything red.)
Sacrifice Cerulean Drake: Counter target spell that targets you.
cards.flavor: Dragons avoid the bright colors of its wings.

rulings.text: Cerulean Drake’s activated ability can target a spell that has multiple targets if at least one of those targets is you.

foreignNames.name: Himmelblauer Sceada
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Schutz vor Rot (Diese Kreatur kann von nichts Rotem geblockt oder als Ziel bestimmt werden, von ihm Schaden zugefügt bekommen oder von ihm verzaubert oder ausgerüstet werden.)
Opfere den Himmelblauen Sceada: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, der dich als Ziel hat.
foreignNames.flavor: Drachen meiden ihn wegen der grellen Farbe seiner Schwingen.

foreignNames.name: Draco cerúleo
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Protección contra rojo. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada, hecha objetivo, recibir daño, estar encantada o ser equipada por nada rojo.)
Sacrificar el Draco cerúleo: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo que te hace objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Los dragones evitan los vivos colores de sus alas.

foreignNames.name: Drakôn céruléen
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Protection contre le rouge (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée, ciblée, blessée, enchantée ou équipée par quoi que ce soit de rouge.)
Sacrifiez le Drakôn céruléen : Contrecarrez un sort ciblé qui vous cible.
foreignNames.flavor: Les dragons restent à l'écart des couleurs vives de ses ailes.

foreignNames.name: Draghetto Ceruleo
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Protezione dal rosso (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata, bersagliata, non le può essere inflitto danno, né può essere incantata o equipaggiata da nulla di rosso.)
Sacrifica il Draghetto Ceruleo: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio che ti bersaglia.
foreignNames.flavor: I draghi evitano i colori sgargianti delle sue ali.

foreignNames.name: 紺碧のドレイク
foreignNames.text:
飛行
プロテクション（赤）（このクリーチャーは赤のものによっては、ブロックされず、対象にならず、ダメージを与えられず、エンチャントされず、装備されない。）
紺碧のドレイクを生け贄に捧げる：あなたを対象とする呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ドレイク
foreignNames.flavor: ドラゴンはその翼の鮮やかな色を避ける。

foreignNames.name: 순청색 드레이크
foreignNames.text:
비행
적색으로부터 보호 (이 생물은 적색 원천에게 방어될 수 없고, 적색 원천의 목표로 정해질 수 없고, 적색 원천으로부터 피해를 입지 않고, 적색 원천이 부여되거나 장착될 수 없다.)
순청색 드레이크를 희생한다: 당신을 목표로 하는 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 용들은 그것의 밝은 색채를 기피한다.

foreignNames.name: Dragonete Cerúleo
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Proteção contra o vermelho (Esta criatura não pode ser bloqueada, ser alvo, sofrer dano, ser encantada nem equipada por nada vermelho.)
Sacrifique Dragonete Cerúleo: Anule a mágica alvo que tenha você como alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Os dragões evitam as cores brilhantes das asas dele.

foreignNames.name: Лазоревый Дрейк
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Защита от красного (Красные объекты не могут блокировать это существо, делать его своей целью, наносить ему повреждения, зачаровывать или снаряжать.)
Пожертвуйте Лазоревого Дрейка: отмените целевое заклинание, целью которого являетесь вы.
foreignNames.flavor: Завидев его яркие крылья, драконы стараются держаться подальше.

foreignNames.name: 蔚蓝龙兽
foreignNames.text:
飞行
反红保护（此生物不能被红色的东西阻挡、指定为目标、造成伤害、结附或是装备。）
牺牲蔚蓝龙兽：反击目标咒语，且该咒语须以你为目标。
foreignNames.flavor: 巨龙都会避开其双翼上的亮彩。

foreignNames.name: 蔚藍龍獸
foreignNames.text:
飛行
反紅保護（此生物不能被紅色的東西阻擋、指定為目標、造成傷害、結附或是裝備。）
犧牲蔚藍龍獸：反擊目標咒語，且該咒語須以你為目標。
foreignNames.flavor: 巨龍都會避開其雙翼上的亮彩。

cards.originalText:
Flying
Protection from red (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything red.)
Sacrifice Cerulean Drake: Counter target spell that targets you.

cards.name: Cloudkin Seer
cards.text:
Flying
When Cloudkin Seer enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "I can see which way the wind is blowing."

foreignNames.name: Wolkensippen-Seherin
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn die Wolkensippen-Seherin ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich kann sehen, in welche Richtung der Wind weht."

foreignNames.name: Vidente nimboide
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando la Vidente nimboide entre al campo de batalla, roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Puedo ver la dirección en la que sopla el viento".

foreignNames.name: Voyante sangnuage
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand la Voyante sangnuage arrive sur le champ de bataille, piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je vois de quel côté le vent souffle. »

foreignNames.name: Veggente Nembiforme
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando la Veggente Nembiforme entra nel campo di battaglia, pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Posso vedere la direzione in cui soffia il vento."

foreignNames.name: 雲族の予見者
foreignNames.text:
飛行
雲族の予見者が戦場に出たとき、カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: 「私には風の吹く方角が見える。」

foreignNames.name: 구름 일족 예언자
foreignNames.text:
비행
구름 일족 예언자가 전장에 들어올 때, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "내겐 바람이 어느 쪽으로 부는 지가 보여."

foreignNames.name: Vidente Nubígena
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Vidente Nubígena entrar no campo de batalha, compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu vejo para onde o vento sopra."

foreignNames.name: Тучерожденная Провидица
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда Тучерожденная Провидица выходит на поле битвы, возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Я вижу, в какую сторону дует ветер».

foreignNames.name: 云身预言师
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当云身预言师进战场时，抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我能看清风因何而起。」

foreignNames.name: 雲身預言師
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當雲身預言師進戰場時，抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我能看清風因何而起。」

cards.originalText:
Flying
When Cloudkin Seer enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.name: Convolute
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
cards.flavor: "Let's see how badly you want what you came for!"

foreignNames.name: Eingerollte Worte
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, es sei denn, sein Beherrscher bezahlt {4}.
foreignNames.flavor: „Mal sehen, wie wichtig dir der Grund ist, weshalb du gekommen bist!"

foreignNames.name: Enrevesar
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo a menos que su controlador pague {4}.
foreignNames.flavor: "¡Veamos cuánto ansías realmente lo que viniste a buscar!".

foreignNames.name: Circonvolution
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé à moins que son contrôleur ne paie {4}.
foreignNames.flavor: « Voyons voir à quel point tu tiens à ce que tu es venu chercher ! »

foreignNames.name: Contorcere
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore non paghi {4}.
foreignNames.flavor: "Vediamo quanto ti sta davvero a cuore ciò per cui sei venuto!"

foreignNames.name: 巻き込み
foreignNames.text: 呪文１つを対象とする。それのコントローラーが{4}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「お前が求めるものをどれほど欲しているのか、試してみるとしよう。」

foreignNames.name: 곡해
foreignNames.text: 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문의 조종자가 {4}를 지불하지 않으면 그 주문을 무효화한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "네가 이걸 얼마나 원하는 지 한 번 보자구!"

foreignNames.name: Enrolar
foreignNames.text: Anule a mágica alvo, a menos que seu controlador pague {4}.
foreignNames.flavor: "Vamos ver se você quer mesmo o que veio buscar!"

foreignNames.name: Свертывание
foreignNames.text: Отмените целевое заклинание, если только контролирующий его игрок не заплатит {4}.
foreignNames.flavor: «Посмотрим, насколько сильно тебе нужно то, за чем ты явился!»

foreignNames.name: 回旋
foreignNames.text: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{4}，否则反击之。
foreignNames.flavor: 「看看你有多想要！」

foreignNames.name: 迴旋
foreignNames.text: 除非目標咒語的操控者支付{4}，否則反擊之。
foreignNames.flavor: 「看看你有多想要！」

cards.originalText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

cards.name: Drawn from Dreams
cards.text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
cards.flavor:
"From a sea of infinite possibilities, our choices create the future."
—Mu Yanling

foreignNames.name: Herbeiträumen
foreignNames.text: Schaue dir die obersten sieben Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm zwei davon auf deine Hand und lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Aus einem Meer unendlicher Möglichkeiten formen unsere Entscheidungen die Zukunft."
—Mu Yanling

foreignNames.name: Extraer de los sueños
foreignNames.text: Mira las siete primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon dos de ellas en tu mano y el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en un orden aleatorio.
foreignNames.flavor:
"De un mar de posibilidades infinitas, nuestras elecciones crean el futuro".
—Mu Yanling

foreignNames.name: Issu des rêves
foreignNames.text: Regardez les sept cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez deux d'entre elles dans votre main et le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans un ordre aléatoire.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Puisés dans un océan d'infinies possibilités, nos choix dessinent l'avenir. »
—Mu Yanling

foreignNames.name: Tratto dai Sogni
foreignNames.text: Guarda le prime sette carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungine due alla tua mano e metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in ordine casuale.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Da un mare di infinite possibilità, le nostre scelte creano il futuro."
—Mu Yanling

foreignNames.name: 抽象からの抽出
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを７枚見る。そのうち２枚をあなたの手札に加え、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に無作為の順番で置く。
foreignNames.flavor:
「無限の可能性の海から、私たちの選択が未来を作るのです。」
――ムー・ヤンリン

foreignNames.name: 꿈에 이끌리다
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 일곱 장을 본다. 그중 두 장을 당신의 손으로 가져가고 나머지 카드들은 무작위 순서로 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"무한한 가능성의 바다 속에서, 우리의 선택이 미래를 만들어낸다."
—무 얀링

foreignNames.name: Extraído dos Sonhos
foreignNames.text: Olhe os sete cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque dois deles em sua mão e o restante no fundo de seu grimório em ordem aleatória.
foreignNames.flavor:
"De um mar de possibilidades infinitas, nossas escolhas criam o futuro."
— Mu Yanling

foreignNames.name: Вытянуть из Грез
foreignNames.text: Посмотрите семь верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Положите две из них в вашу руку, а остальные — в низ вашей библиотеки в случайном порядке.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Наш выбор в океане бесконечных возможностей создает для нас будущее».
— Му Янлин

foreignNames.name: 梦幻成真
foreignNames.text: 检视你牌库顶的七张牌。将其中两张置于你手上，其余的牌则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。
foreignNames.flavor:
「世间的种种可能如汪洋般浩瀚，而未来则从你我的选择中逐步成形。」
～沐燕灵

foreignNames.name: 夢幻成真
foreignNames.text: 檢視你牌庫頂的七張牌。將其中兩張置於你手上，其餘的牌則以隨機順序置於你的牌庫底。
foreignNames.flavor:
「世間的種種可能如汪洋般浩瀚，而未來則從你我的選擇中逐步成形。」
～沐燕靈

cards.originalText: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Dungeon Geists
cards.text:
Flying
When Dungeon Geists enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Dungeon Geists.

rulings.text: The ability can target a tapped creature. If the targeted creature is already tapped when it resolves, that creature just remains tapped and doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
If another player gains control of Dungeon Geists, its effect expires. It won’t keep the creature from untapping anymore, even if you later regain control of Dungeon Geists.

Dungeon Geists’s triggered ability can target a tapped creature. If the targeted creature is already tapped when it resolves, that creature just remains tapped and won’t untap during its controller’s untap step.
If Dungeon Geists leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability has resolved, the target creature will be tapped, but it will be able to untap as normal.

foreignNames.name: Verliesgeist
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Verliesgeist ins Spiel kommt, tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. Die Kreatur enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers, solange du den Verliesgeist kontrollierst.

foreignNames.name: Geists del calabozo
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando los Geists del calabozo entren al campo de batalla, gira la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. Esa criatura no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador mientras controles a los Geists del calabozo.

foreignNames.name: Geists de donjon
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand les Geists de donjon arrivent sur le champ de bataille, engagez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. Cette créature ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur tant que vous contrôlez les Geists de donjon.

foreignNames.name: Geist delle Segrete
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando i Geist delle Segrete entrano nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. Quella creatura non STAPpa durante lo STAP del suo controllore fintanto che controlli i Geist delle Segrete.

foreignNames.name: 地下牢の霊
foreignNames.text:
飛行
地下牢の霊が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。あなたが地下牢の霊をコントロールし続けているかぎり、そのクリーチャーはそれのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignNames.name: 지하감옥 심령들
foreignNames.text:
비행
지하감옥 심령들이 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 탭되며, 당신이 지하감옥 심령들을 조종하는 한 조종자의 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.

foreignNames.name: Geists da Masmorra
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Geists da Masmorra entrar no campo de batalha, vire a criatura alvo que um oponente controla. Aquela criatura não será desvirada durante a etapa de desvirar de seu controlador enquanto você controlar Geists da Masmorra.

foreignNames.name: Привидения из Темниц
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда Привидения из Темниц выходят на поле битвы, поверните целевое существо под контролем оппонента. То существо не разворачивается во время шага разворота контролирующего его игрока, пока вы контролируете Привидений из Темниц.

foreignNames.name: 地城游魂
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当地城游魂进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。于你操控地城游魂的时段内，该生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

foreignNames.name: 地城遊魂
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當地城遊魂進戰場時，橫置目標由對手操控的生物。於你操控地城遊魂的時段內，該生物於其操控者的重置步驟中不能重置。

cards.originalText:
Flying
When Dungeon Geists enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Dungeon Geists.

cards.name: Faerie Miscreant
cards.text:
Flying
When Faerie Miscreant enters the battlefield, if you control another creature named Faerie Miscreant, draw a card.
cards.flavor: One faerie distracts the judge while a second steals the law.

rulings.text: Faerie Miscreant’s triggered ability checks to see if you control another creature named Faerie Miscreant at the time the new Faerie Miscreant enters the battlefield. If you don’t, the ability won’t trigger at all. The ability will check again as it tries to resolve. If, at that time, you don’t control another creature named Faerie Miscreant, the ability will have no effect.

foreignNames.name: Feen-Missetäterin
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn die Feen-Missetäterin ins Spiel kommt und falls du eine andere Kreatur namens Feen-Missetäterin kontrollierst, ziehe eine Karte.

cards.name: Flood of Tears
cards.text: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. If you return four or more nontoken permanents you control this way, you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"I have wept such a torrent as to scour the land clean."
—Mu Yanling

rulings.text: If you return four or more nontoken permanents, the permanent card you put onto the battlefield may be one of the cards returned to your hand this way.

Any abilities that trigger as the nonland permanents are returned are put onto the stack at the same time as any abilities that trigger as the permanent card is put onto the battlefield (if applicable).

If a permanent would be returned to your hand but ends up in another zone (most likely because an effect exiled it instead or because it's a player's commander in the Commander variant) Flood of Tears counts it when determining whether four or more of your nontoken permanents were returned.

foreignNames.name: Flut aus Tränen
foreignNames.text: Bringe alle bleibenden Nichtland-Karten auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück. Falls du auf diese Weise vier oder mehr bleibende Nichtspielstein-Karten, die du kontrollierst, auf deine Hand zurückbringst, kannst du eine bleibende Karte aus deiner Hand ins Spiel bringen.

„Ich habe eine Flut aus Tränen geweint, um das Land reinzuwaschen."
—Mu Yanling

foreignNames.name: Inundación de lágrimas

"El torrente que lloré podría bañar la tierra entera".

foreignNames.name: Déluge de larmes

"Ho versato un fiume di lacrime così impetuoso da ripulire completamente la terra."

cards.name: Leyline of Anticipation
cards.text:
If Leyline of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
You may cast spells as though they had flash.

rulings.text: A player's “opening hand” is the hand of cards the player has after all players have taken mulligans. If players have any cards in hand that allow actions to be taken with them from a player's opening hand, the starting player takes all such actions first in any order, followed by each other player in turn order. Then the first turn begins.

foreignNames.name: Ley-Linie der Vorahnung
foreignNames.text:
Falls die Ley-Linie der Vorahnung auf deiner Starthand ist, kannst du die Partie mit ihr im Spiel beginnen.
Du kannst Zaubersprüche wirken, als ob sie Aufblitzen hätten.

foreignNames.name: Línea mística de la anticipación
foreignNames.text:
Si la Línea mística de la anticipación está en tu mano inicial, puedes comenzar el juego con ella en el campo de batalla.
Puedes lanzar hechizos como si tuvieran la habilidad de destello.

foreignNames.name: Ligne ley de prescience
foreignNames.text:
Si la Ligne ley de prescience est dans votre main de départ, vous pouvez l'avoir sur le champ de bataille au début de la partie.
Vous pouvez lancer les sorts comme s'ils avaient le flash.

foreignNames.name: Leyline dell'Anticipazione
foreignNames.text:
Se la Leyline dell'Anticipazione è nella tua mano iniziale, puoi cominciare la partita con essa sul campo di battaglia.
Puoi lanciare magie come se avessero lampo.

foreignNames.name: 予期の力線
foreignNames.text:
予期の力線があなたのゲーム開始時の手札にあるなら、あなたはこれが戦場に出ている状態でゲームを開始してもよい。
あなたは呪文を、それが瞬速を持っているかのように唱えてもよい。

foreignNames.name: 예측의 수맥
foreignNames.text:
게임을 시작할 때 당신의 손에 예측의 수맥이 있다면, 당신은 예측의 수맥을 전장에 놓은 채로 게임을 시작할 수 있다.
당신은 주문들을 섬광을 가진 것처럼 발동할 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Linha de Força da Antecipação
foreignNames.text:
Se Linha de Força da Antecipação estiver em sua mão de abertura, você poderá começar o jogo com ela no campo de batalha.
Você pode conjurar mágicas como se elas tivessem lampejo.

foreignNames.name: Лучи Предвкушения
foreignNames.text:
Если Лучи Предвкушения находятся в вашей начальной руке, вы можете начать партию с ними на поле битвы.
Вы можете разыгрывать заклинания, как будто у них есть Миг.

foreignNames.name: 先制地脉
foreignNames.text:
如果你的起手牌中包含了先制地脉，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。
你可以将咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

foreignNames.name: 先制地脈
foreignNames.text:
如果你的起手牌中包含了先制地脈，則你可以讓它在戰場上來開始遊戲。
你可以將咒語視同具有閃現異能地來施放。

cards.originalText:
If Leyline of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
You may cast spells as though they had flash.

cards.name: Masterful Replication
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens.
• Choose target artifact you control. Each other artifact you control becomes a copy of that artifact until end of turn.

rulings.text: Masterful Replication copies the printed values of the target artifact. It won't copy counters on that artifact or effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on. Notably, it won't copy effects that made the target artifact become an artifact creature if it isn't normally an artifact creature.

An Equipment that becomes a copy of a creature becomes unattached if it was attached to a creature. An Equipment that becomes a copy of another Equipment remains attached if it was attached to a creature.
If the target artifact is copying something else, then your artifacts become copies of whatever the target artifact copied.
Becoming a copy won't change whether an artifact is a token.

foreignNames.name: Meisterliche Replikation
foreignNames.text:
Bestimme eines —
• Erzeuge zwei 3/3 farblose Golem-Artefaktkreaturenspielsteine.
• Bestimme ein Artefakt deiner Wahl, das du kontrollierst. Jedes andere Artefakt, das du kontrollierst, wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer Kopie jenes Artefakts.

foreignNames.name: Replicación experta
foreignNames.text:
Elige uno:
• Crea dos fichas de criatura artefacto Gólem incoloras 3/3.
• Elige un artefacto objetivo que controlas. Cada otro artefacto que controlas se convierte en una copia de ese artefacto hasta el final del turno.

foreignNames.name: Duplication experte
foreignNames.text:
Choisissez l'un —
• Créez deux jetons de créature-artefact 3/3 incolore Golem.
• Choisissez un artefact ciblé que vous contrôlez. Chaque autre artefact que vous contrôlez devient une copie de cet artefact jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Replica Magistrale
foreignNames.text:
Scegli uno —
• Crea due pedine creatura artefatto Golem 3/3 incolori.
• Scegli un artefatto bersaglio che controlli. Ogni altro artefatto che controlli diventa una copia di quell'artefatto fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: 手慣れた複製
foreignNames.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
• 無色の３/３のゴーレム・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークンを２体生成する。
• あなたがコントロールしているアーティファクト１つを対象とする。ターン終了時まで、他のあなたがコントロールしている各アーティファクトは、対象としたアーティファクトのコピーになる。

foreignNames.name: 숙련된 복제
foreignNames.text:
하나를 선택한다 —
• 3/3 무색 골렘 마법물체 생물 토큰 두 개를 만든다.
• 당신이 조종하는 마법물체를 목표로 정한다. 당신이 조종하는 다른 마법물체들은 각각 턴종료까지 그 마법물체의 복사본이 된다.

foreignNames.name: Replicação Magistral
foreignNames.text:
Escolha um —
• Crie duas fichas de criatura artefato incolor 3/3 do tipo Golem.
• Escolha o artefato alvo que você controla. Cada outro artefato que você controla se torna uma cópia daquele artefato até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: Искусное Воспроизведение
foreignNames.text:
Выберите одно —
• Создайте две фишки артефакта существа 3/3 бесцветный Голем.
• Выберите целевой артефакт под вашим контролем. Каждый другой артефакт под вашим контролем становится копией того артефакта до конца хода.

foreignNames.name: 精妙复造
foreignNames.text:
选择一项～
•派出两个3/3无色魔像衍生神器生物。
•选择目标由你操控的神器。每个由你操控的其他神器均成为该神器的复制品直到回合结束。

foreignNames.name: 精妙複造
foreignNames.text:
選擇一項～
•派出兩個3/3無色魔像衍生神器生物。
•選擇目標由你操控的神器。每個由你操控的其他神器均成為該神器的複製品直到回合結束。

cards.originalText:
Choose one —
• Create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens.
• Choose target artifact you control. Each other artifact you control becomes a copy of that artifact until end of turn.

cards.name: Metropolis Sprite
cards.text:
Flying
{U}: Metropolis Sprite gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Well, if that goblin didn't want his tongue pierced, he shouldn't have stuck it out at me."

foreignNames.name: Metropolensylphide
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
{U}: Die Metropolensylphide erhält +1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: „Tja, wenn dieser Goblin seine Zunge nicht durchbohrt haben wollte, hätte er sie mir nicht herausstrecken sollen."

foreignNames.name: Hada de la metrópolis
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
{U}: El Hada de la metrópolis obtiene +1/-1 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "En fin, si ese trasgo no quería que le agujereara la lengua, no me la hubiera sacado".

foreignNames.name: Farfadette de métropole
foreignNames.text:
Vol
{U} : La Farfadette de métropole gagne +1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ma foi, si ce gobelin ne voulait pas une langue fourchue, il n'avait qu'à pas me la tirer. »

foreignNames.name: Spiritella della Metropoli
foreignNames.text:
Volare
{U}: La Spiritella della Metropoli prende +1/-1 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Beh, se quel goblin non mi avesse fatto le linguacce, la sua lingua ora non avrebbe un buco."

foreignNames.name: 大都市のスプライト
foreignNames.text:
飛行
{U}：ターン終了時まで、大都市のスプライトは＋１/－１の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — フェアリー・ならず者
foreignNames.flavor: 「あのゴブリンだって、舌を貫かれたくなかったなら、あたしにあかんべぇしなけりゃよかったのよ。」

foreignNames.name: 대도시 요정
foreignNames.text:
비행
{U}: 대도시 요정은 턴종료까지 +1/-1을 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "저 고블린이 혀에 구멍이 나서 불만이라고? 그럼 내 앞에서 혀를 내밀지를 말던가."

foreignNames.name: Sílfide da Metrópole
foreignNames.text:
Voar
{U}: Sílfide da Metrópole recebe +1/-1 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Bem, se aquele goblin não queria ter a língua furada, não a deveria ter mostrado para mim."

foreignNames.name: Фея Мегаполиса
foreignNames.text:
Полет
{U}: Фея Мегаполиса получает +1/-1 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: «Если этот гоблин не хотел, чтобы ему прокололи язык, не надо было его показывать».

foreignNames.name: 都会仙子
foreignNames.text:
飞行
{U}：都会仙子得+1/-1直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「好吧，若那鬼怪不想自己的舌头被穿洞，先前就不该对我吐舌头。」

foreignNames.name: 都會仙子
foreignNames.text:
飛行
{U}：都會仙子得+1/-1直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「好吧，若那鬼怪不想自己的舌頭被穿洞，先前就不該對我吐舌頭。」

cards.originalText:
Flying
{U}: Metropolis Sprite gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Moat Piranhas

—Gorin der Tollkühne

foreignNames.name: Pirañas del foso

foreignNames.name: Piranhas des douves
foreignNames.text: Défenseur (Cette créature ne peut pas attaquer.)
foreignNames.flavor:

—Gorin l'impudent

foreignNames.name: Piranha del Fossato
foreignNames.text: Difensore (Questa creatura non può attaccare.)

――厚顔なゴリン

foreignNames.name: 해자 피라냐
foreignNames.text: 수비태세 (이 생물은 공격할 수 없다.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"뭘 그래, 그렇게 깊지도 않다고!"
—뻔뻔한 고린

foreignNames.name: Piranhas do Fosso
foreignNames.text: Defensor (Esta criatura não pode atacar.)

foreignNames.name: Пираньи из Рва

foreignNames.flavor:

— Горин Дерзкий

foreignNames.name: 护城河食人鱼

～鲁莽的葛林

「快過來，水不深！」
～魯莽的葛林

cards.originalText: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

cards.name: Mu Yanling, Sky Dancer
cards.text:
[+2]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gets -2/-0 and loses flying.
[−3]: Create a 4/4 blue Elemental Bird creature token with flying.
[−8]: You get an emblem with "Islands you control have '{T}: Draw a card.'"

rulings.text: Mu Yanling’s first ability can target a creature that doesn’t have flying. The creature just gets -2/-0.
After Mu Yanling’s first ability has resolved, the target creature will have flying again if another effect grants it flying.
An Island is a land with the subtype Island, not any land with a mana ability that produces blue mana.
Tapping an Island for mana is an activated ability. You can’t activate that ability and also activate the ability it gains from Mu Yanling’s emblem.

In a multiplayer game, if you leave the game after Mu Yanling’s first ability resolves but before your next turn begins, its effect lasts until your next turn would have begun. It neither expires immediately nor lasts indefinitely.

foreignNames.name: Mu Yanling die Himmelstänzerin
foreignNames.text:
+2: Bis zu deinem nächsten Zug erhält bis zu eine Kreatur deiner Wahl -2/-0 und verliert Flugfähigkeit.
−3: Erzeuge einen 4/4 blauen Elementarwesen-Vogel-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.
−8: Du erhältst ein Emblem mit „Inseln, die du kontrollierst, haben ‚{T}: Ziehe eine Karte.'"

foreignNames.name: Mu Yanling, Bailarina del Cielo
foreignNames.text:

−3: Crea una ficha de criatura Ave Elemental azul 4/4 con la habilidad de volar.
−8: Obtienes un emblema con "Las Islas que controlas tienen '{T}: Roba una carta'".

foreignNames.name: Mu Yanling, danseuse céleste
foreignNames.text:
+2 : Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, jusqu'à une créature ciblée gagne -2/-0 et perd le vol.
-3 : Créez un jeton de créature 4/4 bleue Élémental et Oiseau avec le vol.
-8 : Vous gagnez un emblème avec « Les îles que vous contrôlez ont '{T} : Piochez une carte.' »

foreignNames.name: Mu Yanling, Danzatrice Celeste
foreignNames.text:

-3: Crea una pedina creatura Uccello Elementale 4/4 blu con volare.
-8: Ottieni un emblema con "Le Isole che controlli hanno '{T}: Pesca una carta'".

foreignNames.name: 空の踊り手、ムー・ヤンリン
foreignNames.text:
