-3：飛行を持つ青の４/４のエレメンタル・鳥・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
-8：あなたは「あなたがコントロールしている島は『{T}：カードを１枚引く。』を持つ。」を持つ紋章を得る。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のプレインズウォーカー — ヤンリン

foreignNames.name: 천공의 무용수, 무 얀링
foreignNames.text:
+2: 생물을 최대 한 개까지 목표로 정한다. 당신의 다음 턴까지, 그 생물은 -2/-0을 받고 비행을 잃는다.
−3: 비행을 가진 4/4 청색 정령 조류 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
−8: 당신은 "당신이 조종하는 섬은 '{T}: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.'를 가진다."를 가진 휘장을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Mu Yanling, Dançarina Celeste
foreignNames.text:
+2: Até seu próximo turno, até uma criatura alvo recebe -2/-0 e perde voar.
−3: Crie uma ficha de criatura 4/4 azul do tipo Elemental Ave com voar.
−8: Você recebe um emblema com "As Ilhas que você controla têm '{T}: Compre um card.'"

foreignNames.name: Му Янлин, Небесная Плясунья
foreignNames.text:
+2: до вашего следующего хода не более одного целевого существа получает -2/-0 и теряет Полет.
—3: создайте одну фишку существа 4/4 синий Элементаль Птица с Полетом.
—8: вы получаете эмблему со способностью «Острова под вашим контролем имеют способность "{T}: возьмите карту"».

foreignNames.name: 舞空沐燕灵
foreignNames.text:
+2：直到你的下一个回合，至多一个目标生物得-2/-0且失去飞行异能。
−3：派出一个4/4蓝色，具飞行异能的元素／鸟衍生生物。
−8：你获得具有「由你操控的海岛具有『{T}：抓一张牌』」的徽记。

foreignNames.name: 舞空沐燕靈
foreignNames.text:
+2：直到你的下一個回合，至多一個目標生物得-2/-0且失去飛行異能。
−3：派出一個4/4藍色，具飛行異能的元素／鳥衍生生物。
−8：你獲得具有「由你操控的海島具有『{T}：抽一張牌』」的徽記。

cards.originalText:
+2: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gets -2/-0 and loses flying.
−3: Create a 4/4 blue Elemental Bird creature token with flying.
−8: You get an emblem with "Islands you control have ‘{T}: Draw a card.'"

cards.name: Negate
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
cards.flavor: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: 'No.'"

rulings.text: A “creature spell” is any spell with the type creature, even if it has other types such as artifact or enchantment. Older cards of type summon are also creature spells.

foreignNames.name: Negieren
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: „Mit vereinter Kraft erhebt die Natur ihre Stimme und sagt: ‚Nein.'"

foreignNames.name: Negar
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo que no sea de criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "La naturaleza entera alza la voz para decirte con sus muchas bocas: 'No'".

foreignNames.name: Négation
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez le sort non-créature ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: « Unie, la nature lève la voix pour vous dire "Non". »

foreignNames.name: Negare
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia non creatura bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Unita, la natura leva la sua voce per dirvi: 'No'."

foreignNames.name: 否認
foreignNames.text: クリーチャーでない呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「自然がね、あなたに向かって口をそろえて言うのよ。『だめだ。』ってね。」

foreignNames.name: 부인
foreignNames.text: 생물 주문이 아닌 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "자연이 한 마음으로 네게 이 말을 전한다: '안돼.'"

foreignNames.name: Negar
foreignNames.text: Anule a mágica alvo que não seja de criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Em uníssono, a natureza ergue a voz para lhes dizer: 'Não'."

foreignNames.name: Отвергнуть
foreignNames.text: Отмените целевое заклинание, не являющееся заклинанием существа.
foreignNames.flavor: «Вся природа поднимается, чтобы в унисон сказать вам: "Нет"».

foreignNames.name: 失效
foreignNames.text: 反击目标非生物咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 「自然万物齐声喝止：『不许。』」

foreignNames.name: 失效
foreignNames.text: 反擊目標非生物咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 「自然萬物齊聲喝止：『不許。』」

cards.originalText: Counter target noncreature spell.

cards.name: Octoprophet
cards.text: When Octoprophet enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
cards.flavor: In every swirl of the tide, it sees the awakening of things yet to come.

foreignNames.name: Oktoprophet
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Oktoprophet ins Spiel kommt, wende Hellsicht 2 an. (Schaue dir die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst eine beliebige Anzahl davon unter deine Bibliothek legen und den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge oben darauf.)
foreignNames.flavor: In jeder Verwirbelung des Wassers sieht er die Entstehung der Dinge, die erst noch geschehen werden.

foreignNames.name: Cefaloprofeta
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Cefaloprofeta entre al campo de batalla, adivina 2. (Mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca, luego pon cualquier cantidad de ellas en el fondo de tu biblioteca y el resto en la parte superior en cualquier orden.)
foreignNames.flavor: En cada movimiento de la marea ve el despertar de lo que está por venir.

foreignNames.name: Céphaloprophète
foreignNames.text: Quand le Céphaloprophète arrive sur le champ de bataille, regard 2. (Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles au-dessous de votre bibliothèque et le reste, au-dessus, dans n'importe quel ordre.)
foreignNames.flavor: Il voit dans chaque tourbillon de la marée l'éveil de ce qui n'existe pas encore.

foreignNames.name: Piovra Profetica
foreignNames.text: Quando la Piovra Profetica entra nel campo di battaglia, profetizza 2. (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio, poi mettine un qualsiasi numero in fondo al tuo grimorio e le altre in cima in qualsiasi ordine.)
foreignNames.flavor: In ogni vortice della marea, vede affiorare l'avvenire.

foreignNames.name: 予言ダコ
foreignNames.text: 予言ダコが戦場に出たとき、占術２を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを２枚見て、そのうちの望む枚数をあなたのライブラリーの一番下に、残りを一番上に、それぞれ望む順番で置く。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — タコ
foreignNames.flavor: 潮流が作る渦一つ一つから来たる目覚めを読み解く。

foreignNames.name: 문어예언자
foreignNames.text: 문어예언자가 전장에 들어올 때, 점술 2를 한다. (당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 두 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드들 중 원하는 만큼을 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓고 나머지를 당신의 서고 맨 위에 원하는 순서대로 놓을 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 조류가 휩쓸려들 때마다, 그것은 곧 도래할 것들이 깨어나는 것을 지켜본다.

foreignNames.name: Polvofeta
foreignNames.text: Quando Polvofeta entrar no campo de batalha, use vidência 2. (Olhe os dois cards do topo do seu grimório. Depois, coloque qualquer número deles no fundo do seu grimório e o restante no topo em qualquer ordem.)
foreignNames.flavor: Em cada remoinho da maré ele vê o despertar do porvir.

foreignNames.name: Осьмипророк
foreignNames.text: Когда Осьмипророк выходит на поле битвы, предскажите 2. (Посмотрите две верхние карты вашей библиотеки, затем положите любое количество из них в низ вашей библиотеки, а остальные на верх вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.)
foreignNames.flavor: В каждом завихрении прибоя он видит знаки пробуждения неизведанного.

foreignNames.name: 八爪先知
foreignNames.text: 当八爪先知进战场时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）
foreignNames.flavor: 它从周遭每一道浪潮漩涡当中，看到未来事物逐渐苏醒。

foreignNames.name: 八爪先知
foreignNames.text: 當八爪先知進戰場時，占卜2。（檢視你牌庫頂的兩張牌，然後將其中任意數量的牌以任意順序置於你牌庫底，其餘則以任意順序置於你牌庫頂。）
foreignNames.flavor: 它從周遭每一道浪潮漩渦當中，看到未來事物逐漸甦醒。

cards.originalText: When Octoprophet enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Portal of Sanctuary
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Return target creature you control and each Aura attached to it to their owners' hands. Activate only during your turn.
cards.flavor:
"If you need to disappear for a while, I know a place."
—Bilivus, master archivist

rulings.text: Equipment attached to the target creature remains on the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Portal der Zuflucht
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: Bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, und jede an sie angelegte Aura auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur während deines Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Wenn du für ein Weilchen verschwinden musst, kenne ich da einen Ort …"
—Bilivus, Meister-Archivar

foreignNames.name: Portal del santuario
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: Regresa la criatura objetivo que controlas y cada Aura anexada a ella a las manos de sus propietarios. Activa esta habilidad solo durante tu turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Si necesitas desaparecer una temporada, conozco un lugar".
—Bilivus, maestro archivista

foreignNames.name: Portail du sanctuaire
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T} : Renvoyez une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez et chaque aura qui lui est attachée dans les mains de leurs propriétaires. N'activez cette capacité que pendant votre tour.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Si vous avez besoin de disparaître un moment, je sais exactement où aller. »
—Bilivus, maître-archiviste

foreignNames.name: Portale del Santuario
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: Fai tornare una creatura bersaglio che controlli e tutte le Aure ad essa assegnate in mano ai rispettivi proprietari. Attiva questa abilità solo durante il tuo turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Se vuoi sparire per un po', conosco un posto."
—Bilivus, maestro archivista

foreignNames.name: 聖域の門
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}：あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それとそれにつけられているオーラすべてをオーナーの手札に戻す。この能力は、あなたのターンの間にのみ起動できる。
foreignNames.flavor:
「しばらく姿を隠したいなら、いい場所があるよ。」
――文書管理主任、ビリバス

foreignNames.name: 성소의 차원문
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: 당신이 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물과 그 생물에 부착된 모든 마법진을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다. 이 능력은 당신의 턴에만 활성화할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"잠시 동안 사라지고 싶다면, 내가 아는 곳이 있어."
—문서 보관의 대가, 빌리부스

foreignNames.name: Portal do Santuário
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: Devolva a criatura alvo que você controla e cada Aura anexada a ela para a mão de seus donos. Ative esta habilidade apenas durante o seu próprio turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Se você quiser desaparecer por um tempo, eu conheço um lugar."
— Bilivus, arquivista mestre

foreignNames.name: Портал Святилища
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: верните целевое существо под вашим контролем и каждую прикрепленную к нему Ауру в руки их владельцев. Активируйте эту способность только во время вашего хода.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Если тебе нужно на время исчезнуть, я знаю подходящее местечко».
— Биливус, мастер-архивариус

foreignNames.name: 庇护通道
foreignNames.text: {1}，{T}：将目标由你操控的生物与结附于其上的所有灵气各移回其拥有者手上。只能于你的回合中起动此异能。
foreignNames.flavor:
「如果你要消失一阵，我知道一个好地方。」
～书库辖员总管比利沃斯

foreignNames.name: 庇護通道
foreignNames.text: {1}，{T}：將目標由你操控的生物與結附於其上的所有靈氣各移回其擁有者手上。只能於你的回合中起動此異能。
foreignNames.flavor:
「如果你要消失一陣，我知道一個好地方。」
～書庫轄員總管比利沃斯

cards.originalText: {1}, {T}: Return target creature you control and each Aura attached to it to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn.

cards.name: Renowned Weaponsmith
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
{U}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Heart-Piercer Bow or Vial of Dragonfire, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

rulings.text: Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities, such as equip, are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text. You can’t spend mana added by this ability to pay costs of triggered abilities of artifacts such as the first ability of Chandra’s Regulator.
The mana generated by Renowned Weaponsmith’s first ability can’t be spent to activate abilities of artifact sources that aren’t on the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Angesehener Waffenschmied
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}{C}. Verwende dieses Mana nur, um Artefaktzauber zu wirken oder Fähigkeiten von Artefakten zu aktivieren.
{U}, {T}: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Karte namens Herzstecherbogen oder Phiole mit Drachenfeuer, zeige sie offen vor, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische dann deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Armero insigne
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}{C}. Usa este maná solo para lanzar hechizos de artefacto o activar habilidades de artefactos.
{U}, {T}: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta llamada Arco perforacorazones o Frasco de fuegodragón, muéstrala, ponla en tu mano y luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Forgeur d'armes réputé
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}{C}. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer des sorts d'artefact ou activer des capacités d'artefact.
{U}, {T} : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte appelée Arc du perce-cœur ou Fiole de feu des dragons, révélez-la, mettez-la dans votre main, puis mélangez votre bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Armaiolo Rinomato
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}{C}. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare magie artefatto o attivare abilità di artefatti.
{U}, {T}: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta chiamata Arco Trafiggicuore o Fiala di Fuoco Draconico, rivelala, aggiungila alla tua mano, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 名高い武器職人
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}{C}を加える。このマナは、アーティファクト・呪文を唱えるためか、アーティファクトの能力を起動するためにのみ使用できる。
{U}, {T}：あなたのライブラリーから「心臓貫きの弓」か「龍火の薬瓶」という名前のカード１枚を探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・工匠

foreignNames.name: 유명한 무기장인
foreignNames.text:
{T}: {C}{C}를 추가한다. 이 마나는 마법물체 주문을 발동하거나 마법물체의 능력을 활성화하는 데에만 사용할 수 있다.
{U}, {T}: 당신의 서고에서 이름이 심장을 관통하는 활 또는 용의 불을 담은 병인 카드 한 장을 찾아 공개한 후 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Armeiro Renomado
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}{C}. Gaste este mana somente para conjurar mágicas de artefato ou ativar habilidades de artefatos.
{U}, {T}: Procure um card com o nome Arco Perfurador de Corações ou Frasco de Fogo Dragônico em seu grimório, revele-o, coloque-o em sua mão e depois embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignNames.name: Знаменитый Оружейник
foreignNames.text:
{T}: добавьте {C}{C}. Тратьте эту ману только на разыгрывание заклинаний артефактов или на активацию способностей артефактов.
{U}, {T}: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту с именем Лук Пронзателя Сердец или Флакон Драконьего Огня, покажите ее, положите ее в вашу руку, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignNames.name: 享誉兵匠
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}{C}。此法术力只能用来施放神器咒语，或是起动神器的异能。
{U}，{T}：从你的牌库中搜寻一张名称为穿心弓或龙炎瓶的牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreignNames.name: 享譽兵匠
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}{C}。此魔法力只能用來施放神器咒語，或是起動神器的異能。
{U}，{T}：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張名稱為穿心弓或龍炎瓶的牌，展示該牌，將它置於你手上，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
{U}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Heart-Piercer Bow or Vial of Dragonfire, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Sage's Row Denizen
cards.text: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills two cards.
cards.flavor: "Forget what you have learned from other teachers. I bring you the truth."

foreignNames.name: Bewohner der Gasse der Weisen
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn eine andere blaue Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, legt ein Spieler deiner Wahl die obersten zwei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: „Vergiss, was andere Lehrmeister dir beigebracht haben. Von mir erfährst du die Wahrheit."

foreignNames.name: Habitante de la Calle del Sabio
foreignNames.text: Siempre que otra criatura azul entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, el jugador objetivo pone las dos primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Olviden lo que aprendieron de sus otros profesores. Yo les traigo la verdad".

foreignNames.name: Habitant du rang du Sage
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'une autre créature bleue arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le joueur ciblé met les deux cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: « Oubliez ce que vous avez appris de vos autres professeurs. Je vous apporte la vérité. »

foreignNames.name: Abitante di Viale della Saggezza
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura blu entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, un giocatore bersaglio mette le prime due carte del suo grimorio nel suo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: "Dimentica quanto hai appreso dagli altri insegnanti. Io ti offro la verità."

foreignNames.name: 賢者街の住人
foreignNames.text: 他の青のクリーチャーが１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上からカードを２枚自分の墓地に置く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ヴィダルケン・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: 「他の教師に学んだことはすべて忘れるのだ。私が真実を授けよう。」

foreignNames.name: 현자의 거리 거주민
foreignNames.text: 다른 청색 생물이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위 카드 두 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "다른 스승들에게서 배웠던 것은 잊어버려라. 내가 네게 진실을 가져다 줄 테니."

foreignNames.name: Habitante da Travessa dos Sábios
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que outra criatura azul entra no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, o jogador alvo coloca os dois cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: "Esqueça o que você aprendeu com outros professores. Eu lhe ofereço a verdade."

foreignNames.name: Житель Ряда Мудрецов
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда другое синее существо выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, целевой игрок кладет две верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor: «Забудьте все, чему научились у других учителей. Я несу вам истину».

foreignNames.name: 智者街居民
foreignNames.text: 每当另一个蓝色生物在你的操控下进战场时，目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。
foreignNames.flavor: 「忘记你从别人那学到的东西。我来告诉你真相。」

foreignNames.name: 智者街居民
foreignNames.text: 每當另一個藍色生物在你的操控下進戰場時，目標玩家將其牌庫頂的兩張牌置入其墳墓場。
foreignNames.flavor: 「忘記你從別人那學到的東西。我來告訴你真相。」

cards.originalText: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

cards.name: Scholar of the Ages
cards.text: When Scholar of the Ages enters the battlefield, return up to two target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "I study the past to find hope for the future."

rulings.text: The triggered ability of Scholar of the Ages can return at most two cards, not two instant cards plus two sorcery cards.

foreignNames.name: Gelehrte der Zeitalter
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Gelehrte der Zeitalter ins Spiel kommt, bringe bis zu zwei Spontanzauber- und/oder Hexereikarten deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich studiere die Vergangenheit und finde darin Hoffnung für die Zukunft."

foreignNames.name: Erudita de las eras
foreignNames.text: Cuando la Erudita de las eras entre al campo de batalla, regresa hasta dos cartas de instantáneo y/o de conjuro objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: "Estudio el pasado con el fin de hallar esperanza para el futuro".

foreignNames.name: Érudite des âges
foreignNames.text: Quand l'Érudite des âges arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez jusqu'à deux cartes d'éphémère et/ou de rituel ciblées depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: « J'étudie le passé afin de trouver de l'espoir pour l'avenir. »

foreignNames.name: Studiosa delle Ere
foreignNames.text: Quando la Studiosa delle Ere entra nel campo di battaglia, riprendi in mano dal tuo cimitero fino a due carte istantaneo e/o stregoneria bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Studio il passato per trovare speranza per il futuro."

foreignNames.name: 星霜の学者
foreignNames.text: 星霜の学者が戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地からインスタントやソーサリーであるカード最大２枚を対象とし、それらをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: 「私が過去を学ぶのは未来の希望を見つけるため。」

foreignNames.name: 시대 연구가
foreignNames.text: 시대 연구가가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 무덤에 있는 순간마법 및/또는 집중마법 카드를 최대 두 장까지 목표로 정한다. 그 카드들을 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: "나는 미래의 희망을 찾기 위해 과거를 연구하지."

foreignNames.name: Erudita das Eras
foreignNames.text: Quando Erudita das Eras entrar no campo de batalha, devolva até dois cards de mágica instantânea e/ou feitiço alvo de seu cemitério para a sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu estudo o passado para achar esperança para o futuro."

foreignNames.name: Исследовательница Веков
foreignNames.text: Когда Исследовательница Веков выходит на поле битвы, верните не более двух целевых карт мгновенных заклинаний и (или) волшебства из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor: «Я изучаю прошлое, чтобы отыскать надежду для будущего».

foreignNames.name: 岁月学者
foreignNames.text: 当岁月学者进战场时，将至多两张目标瞬间和／或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我究研过去，是为了替将来寻找希望。」

foreignNames.name: 歲月學者
foreignNames.text: 當歲月學者進戰場時，將至多兩張目標瞬間和／或巫術牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我究研過去，是為了替將來尋找希望。」

cards.originalText: When Scholar of the Ages enters the battlefield, return up to two target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Sleep Paralysis
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Sleep Paralysis enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
cards.flavor: Sleep doesn't always mean rest.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Sleep Paralysis tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. It won’t enter the battlefield, so its ability won’t trigger.

foreignNames.name: Schlafparalyse
foreignNames.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Wenn die Schlafparalyse ins Spiel kommt, tappe die verzauberte Kreatur.
Die verzauberte Kreatur enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.
foreignNames.flavor: Schlaf verheißt nicht immer Erholung.

foreignNames.name: Parálisis del sueño
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura.
Cuando la Parálisis del sueño entre al campo de batalla, gira la criatura encantada.
La criatura encantada no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador.
foreignNames.flavor: Dormir no siempre es sinónimo de descanso.

foreignNames.name: Paralysie du sommeil
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : créature
Quand la Paralysie du sommeil arrive sur le champ de bataille, engagez la créature enchantée.
La créature enchantée ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.
foreignNames.flavor: Le sommeil n'est pas toujours reposant.

foreignNames.name: Paralisi nel Sonno
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura
Quando la Paralisi nel Sonno entra nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa la creatura incantata.
La creatura incantata non STAPpa durante lo STAP del suo controllore.
foreignNames.flavor: Non sempre il sonno è sinonimo di riposo.

foreignNames.name: 金縛り
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
金縛りが戦場に出たとき、エンチャントしているクリーチャーをタップする。
エンチャントしているクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
foreignNames.type: エンチャント — オーラ
foreignNames.flavor: 眠りが常に休息を意味するとは限らない。

foreignNames.name: 수면 마비
foreignNames.text:

foreignNames.name: Сонный Паралич
foreignNames.text:

Зачарованное существо не разворачивается во время шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.
foreignNames.flavor: Сон не всегда приносит отдых.

foreignNames.name: 睡眠瘫痪症

当睡眠瘫痪症进战场时，横置所结附的生物。
所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。
foreignNames.flavor: 睡眠并不都意味着休息。

foreignNames.name: 睡眠癱瘓症

結附於生物

所結附的生物於其操控者的重置步驟中不能重置。
foreignNames.flavor: 睡眠並不都意味著休息。

cards.originalText:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
{3}{U}: Draw a card.

cards.name: Tale's End
cards.text: Counter target activated ability, triggered ability, or legendary spell.
cards.flavor:
"When you are gone, will anyone remember your story?"
—Unknown

rulings.text: Tale’s End can’t target an activated or triggered mana ability. An activated mana ability is one that adds mana to a player’s mana pool as it resolves, doesn’t have a target, and isn’t a loyalty ability. A triggered mana ability is one that adds mana to a player’s mana pool and triggers on an activated mana ability.
Activated abilities are written in the form “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities (such as equip) are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder texts, if applicable.

Triggered abilities use the word “when,” “whenever,” or “at.” They’re often written as “[Trigger condition], [effect].” Some keyword abilities are triggered abilities and will have “when,” “whenever,” or “at” in their reminder text.

Abilities that create replacement effects, such as a permanent entering the battlefield tapped or with counters on it, can’t be targeted. Abilities that apply “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” are also replacement effects and can’t be targeted.

If you counter a delayed triggered ability that triggered at the beginning of the “next” occurrence of a specified step or phase, that ability won’t trigger again the following time that step or phase occurs.

foreignNames.name: Ende der Geschichte
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere eine aktivierte Fähigkeit, eine ausgelöste Fähigkeit oder einen legendären Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Wenn du gegangen bist, wird sich dann irgendjemand an deine Geschichte erinnern?"
—Unbekannt

foreignNames.name: Fin de la historia
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta la habilidad activada, la habilidad disparada o el hechizo legendario objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Cuando ya no estés, ¿recordará alguien tu historia?".
—Anónimo

foreignNames.name: Fin du conte
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez la capacité activée ciblée, la capacité déclenchée ciblée ou le sort légendaire ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Quand vous ne serez plus là, quelqu'un se souviendra-t-il de votre histoire ? »
—Anonyme

foreignNames.name: Fine della Storia

foreignNames.flavor:
"Quando non ci sarai più, qualcuno ricorderà la tua storia?"

foreignNames.name: 物語の終わり

「君が死んだ後、誰かが君の物語を思い出すだろうか？」

foreignNames.name: 이야기의 끝

"네가 떠나고 나면, 네 이야기를 기억하는 사람이 있기나 할까?"
—신원 미상

foreignNames.name: Fim do Conto

foreignNames.flavor:
"Quando você se for, alguém vai se lembrar da sua história?"
— Desconhecido

foreignNames.name: Конец Истории

foreignNames.flavor:
«Когда тебя не станет, вспомнит ли кто-нибудь твою историю?»
— Неизвестный

foreignNames.name: 传说终结

foreignNames.name: 傳說終結

foreignNames.flavor:
「你死去後，是否還會有人記得你的故事？」
～無名氏

cards.originalText: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Warden of Evos Isle
cards.text:
Flying
Creature spells with flying you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: On Evos Isle, the swift and formidable aven enforce the will of the ruling sphinxes.

rulings.text: A creature spell that doesn’t have flying won’t cost less even if an effect will cause the creature to have flying once on the battlefield. This is also true if the creature spell itself has an ability that gives it flying once on the battlefield under certain conditions, even if those conditions are true.
The last ability of Warden of Evos Isle can’t reduce the colored mana requirement of a creature spell with flying.

foreignNames.name: Hüter der Insel Evos
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Kreaturenzauber mit Flugfähigkeit, die du wirkst, kosten beim Wirken {1} weniger.

foreignNames.name: Protector de la Isla Evos
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar los hechizos de criatura con la habilidad de volar.

비행

foreignNames.name: 伊弗斯島護衛

飛行

foreignNames.flavor: 在伊弗斯島上，迅捷且強大的艾文負責執行史芬斯統治者之意願。

cards.originalText:
Flying
Creature spells with flying you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.name: Winged Words
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a creature with flying.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: Magic written across the sky falls like rain on thirsty ground, bringing forth wisdom in its season.

rulings.text: Once you announce that you’re casting Winged Words, no player may take actions until the spell has been paid for. Notably, opponents can’t try to change whether you control a creature with flying.
Winged Words costs only {1} less to cast if you control multiple creatures with flying.

foreignNames.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken {1} weniger, falls du eine fliegende Kreatur kontrollierst.
Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignNames.flavor: La magia escrita en el cielo cae como la lluvia sobre el suelo sediento, regándolo con sabiduría.

foreignNames.text:

如果你操控具飞行异能的生物，则此咒语减少{1}来施放。

foreignNames.name: 翼散良言
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控具飛行異能的生物，則此咒語減少{1}來施放。
抽兩張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 天空遍佈咒文，魔法如甘霖一般落向饑渴的大地，播撒時節智慧。

cards.originalText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a creature with flying.
Draw two cards.

cards.name: Yarok's Wavecrasher
cards.text: When Yarok's Wavecrasher enters the battlefield, return another creature you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Yarok's waters rush and rage
Where armies bled into the sand."
—*Lament for Bala Ged*, stanza 2

rulings.text: If you control no other creatures when the triggered ability resolves, you simply don’t return anything. There’s no penalty for being unable to do so.

foreignNames.text: Wenn Yaroks Wellenschmetterer ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine andere Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Yaroks Wasser rauscht und tobt,
wo einst flossen Blut und Tod."
—*Klagelied für Bala Ged*, 2. Strophe

foreignNames.text: Cuando el Rompeolas de Yarok entre al campo de batalla, regresa otra criatura que controlas a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor:

foreignNames.flavor:

foreignNames.text: Quando lo Schiantaflutti di Yarok entra nel campo di battaglia, fai tornare un'altra creatura che controlli in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Le acque di Yarok scorrono rabbiose

cards.name: Blightbeetle
cards.text:
Protection from green (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything green.)
Creatures your opponents control can't have +1/+1 counters put on them.
cards.flavor: Leaf and soul alike wither at its touch.

rulings.text: Blightbeetle doesn’t remove any +1/+1 counters already on creatures your opponents control.
Creatures your opponents control won’t receive +1/+1 counters as they enter the battlefield.

If a replacement effect allows a player to modify or replace an event by putting +1/+1 counters on a creature affected by Blightbeetle, that player may apply that replacement effect, but they won’t get counters. If the original event is entirely replaced (such as by applying Vigor’s replacement effect), the entire original event simply doesn’t happen.

If the cost of an ability or an additional cost of a spell requires putting +1/+1 counters on a creature affected by Blightbeetle, that cost can’t be paid. If a resolving spell or ability says that a player may put +1/+1 counters on that creature, that player can’t choose to do so.

foreignNames.name: Fäulniskäfer
foreignNames.text:
Schutz vor Grün (Diese Kreatur kann von nichts Grünem geblockt oder als Ziel bestimmt werden, von ihm Schaden zugefügt bekommen oder von ihm verzaubert oder ausgerüstet werden.)
Auf Kreaturen, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, können keine +1/+1-Marken gelegt werden.
foreignNames.flavor: Blätter und Seelen verwelken gleichermaßen bei seiner Berührung.

foreignNames.name: Venenóptero
foreignNames.text:
Protección contra verde. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada, hecha objetivo, recibir daño, estar encantada o ser equipada por nada verde.)
No se puede poner contadores +1/+1 sobre las criaturas que controlan tus oponentes.
foreignNames.flavor: Ya sean hojas o almas, marchita todo lo que toca.

foreignNames.name: Scarabée du fléau
foreignNames.text:

cards.name: Blood for Bones
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return another creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: The creature sacrificed to cast Blood for Bones may be one of the cards chosen to be returned.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you can’t cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you can’t sacrifice additional creatures.
Once you begin to cast Blood for Bones, no player may take actions until you’re done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the creature you wish to sacrifice.

Blood for Bones doesn’t target the creature cards to return from your graveyard. This means that, while the spell is resolving, no player may take any actions between the time you choose the cards and return them.
Any abilities that trigger as the creature card is returned to the battlefield won’t resolve until after Blood for Bones is finished resolving.

cards.name: Bloodthirsty Aerialist
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodthirsty Aerialist.
cards.flavor: A circus acrobat in life, she kills with such fluid grace that even her victims are awed by her performance.

rulings.text: The ability of Bloodthirsty Aerialist triggers just once for each life-gaining event, whether it’s 1 life from Impassioned Orator or 4 life from Dawning Angel. If you gain an amount of life “for each” of something or “equal to the number” of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability of Bloodthirsty Aerialist triggers only once.
If Bloodthirsty Aerialist is dealt lethal damage at the same time that you gain life, it won’t receive a counter from its ability in time to save it.

Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, Bloodthirsty Aerialist’s ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won’t cause the ability to trigger, even though it caused your team’s life total to increase.

Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Ich mache deine Knochen zu einer Waffe, die selbst die Mächtigsten zu Fall bringt."
—Modriss aus Zargoth Fen

foreignNames.name: Astillas óseas
foreignNames.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, sacrifica una criatura.
Destruye la criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Convertiré tus huesos en un arma capaz de derribar incluso a los más poderosos".
—Modriss del pantano Zargoth

foreignNames.name: Fragments d'os
foreignNames.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, sacrifiez une créature.
Détruisez la créature ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Vos os me serviront à créer une arme qui terrassera même les puissants. »
—Modriss de la maremme de Zargoth

foreignNames.name: Schegge d'Osso
foreignNames.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, sacrifica una creatura.
Distruggi una creatura bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Trasformerò le tue ossa in un'arma che abbatterà anche i più potenti."
—Modriss della palude di Zargoth

foreignNames.name: 骨の粉砕
foreignNames.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。
クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「お前の骨も武器にするとしよう。並外れた者でさえも仕留める武器だ。」
――ザルゴス湿原のモドリス

foreignNames.name: 쪼개진 뼈 가시
foreignNames.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 생물 한 개를 희생한다.
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"나는 네 뼈로 저 강대한 자들마저도 쓰러뜨릴 수 있는 무기를 만들 것이다."
—자르고스 늪지의 모드리스

foreignNames.name: Estacas Ósseas
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, sacrifique uma criatura.
Destrua a criatura alvo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Farei de seus ossos uma arma que derrubará até mesmo os poderosos."
— Modriss do Charco de Zargoth

foreignNames.name: Костные Осколки
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания пожертвуйте существо.
Уничтожьте целевое существо.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Из твоих костей я сделаю оружие, которое свалит с ног даже самого могучего врага».
— Модрисс с болота Заргот

foreignNames.name: 碎骨贯身
foreignNames.text:
牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
消灭目标生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我会将你的骨头化作击倒强敌的武器。」
～札戈斯沼的墨垂兹

foreignNames.name: 碎骨貫身
foreignNames.text:
犧牲一個生物，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。
消滅目標生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我會將你的骨頭化作擊倒強敵的武器。」
～札戈斯沼的墨垂茲

cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

cards.name: Boneclad Necromancer
cards.text: When Boneclad Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
cards.flavor: "Living or dead, everyone responds to the proper motivation."

foreignNames.name: Knochenumhüllte Nekromagierin
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Knochenumhüllte Nekromagierin ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof ins Exil schicken. Falls du dies tust, erzeuge einen 2/2 schwarzen Zombie-Kreaturenspielstein.
foreignNames.flavor: „Lebendig oder tot — jeder reagiert auf die richtige Motivation."

foreignNames.name: Nigromante del atavío óseo
foreignNames.text: Cuando la Nigromante del atavío óseo entre al campo de batalla, puedes exiliar la carta de criatura objetivo de un cementerio. Si lo haces, crea una ficha de criatura Zombie negra 2/2.
foreignNames.flavor: "Vivos o muertos, todos respondemos a la motivación adecuada".

foreignNames.name: Nécromancienne à l'habit d'os
foreignNames.text: Quand la Nécromancienne à l'habit d'os arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez exiler une carte de créature ciblée depuis un cimetière. Si vous faites ainsi, créez un jeton de créature 2/2 noire Zombie.
foreignNames.flavor: « Morts ou vivants, tout le monde réagit face au signal adéquat. »

foreignNames.name: Necromante Vestita d'Ossa
foreignNames.text: Quando la Necromante Vestita d'Ossa entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi esiliare una carta creatura bersaglio da un cimitero. Se lo fai, crea una pedina creatura Zombie 2/2 nera.
foreignNames.flavor: "Vivi o morti, tutti rispondono alla motivazione giusta."

foreignNames.name: 骨まといの屍術師
foreignNames.text: 骨まといの屍術師が戦場に出たとき、墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれを追放してもよい。そうしたなら、黒の２/２のゾンビ・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: 「生きていようが死んでいようが、うまく働きかければ応えてくれるわ。」

foreignNames.name: 뼈갑옷 사령술사
foreignNames.text: 뼈갑옷 사령술사가 전장에 들어올 때, 무덤에 있는 생물 카드 한 장을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 그 카드를 추방할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 2/2 흑색 좀비 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: "산 자든 죽은 자든, 적절한 동기 부여가 되면 다들 거기에 반응하지."

foreignNames.name: Necromante da Veste Óssea
foreignNames.text: Quando Necromante da Veste Óssea entra no campo de batalha, você pode exilar o card de criatura alvo de um cemitério. Se fizer isso, crie uma ficha de criatura preta 2/2 do tipo Zumbi.
foreignNames.flavor: "Vivos ou mortos, todos respondem à motivação adequada."

foreignNames.name: Некромантка Костяных Доспехов
foreignNames.text: Когда Некромантка Костяных Доспехов выходит на поле битвы, вы можете изгнать целевую карту существа из кладбища. Если вы это делаете, создайте одну фишку существа 2/2 черный Зомби.
foreignNames.flavor: «Живые, мертвые — все реагируют на правильную мотивацию».

foreignNames.name: 覆骨死灵术士
foreignNames.text: 当覆骨死灵术士进战场时，你可以将目标生物牌从坟墓场放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「无论是死是活，只要给对刺激都会动。」

foreignNames.name: 覆骨死靈術士
foreignNames.text: 當覆骨死靈術士進戰場時，你可以將目標生物牌從墳墓場放逐。若你如此作，則派出一個2/2黑色殭屍衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「無論是死是活，只要給對刺激都會動。」

cards.originalText: When Boneclad Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.name: Cavalier of Night
cards.text:
Lifelink
When Cavalier of Night enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. When you do, destroy target creature an opponent controls.
When Cavalier of Night dies, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

rulings.text: Cavalier of Night’s enters-the-battlefield ability goes on the stack without a target. While that ability is resolving, you may sacrifice another creature. When you do, the reflexive triggered ability triggers and you pick a target creature to be destroyed. This is different from effects that say “If you do . . .” in that players may take actions after you’ve sacrificed the creature but before the target creature is destroyed.
While resolving Cavalier of Night’s enters-the-battlefield ability, you can’t sacrifice more than one creature.
If a card in a graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
If a creature card with mana value 3 or less becomes a copy of Cavalier of Night, its last ability can target itself when it dies.

foreignNames.name: Reiter der Nacht
foreignNames.text:
Lebensverknüpfung
Wenn der Reiter der Nacht ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine andere Kreatur opfern. Wenn du dies tust, zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert.
Wenn der Reiter der Nacht stirbt, bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 3 oder weniger aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.

foreignNames.name: Caballero de la noche
foreignNames.text:
Vínculo vital.
Cuando el Caballero de la noche entre al campo de batalla, puedes sacrificar otra criatura. Cuando lo hagas, destruye la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente.
Cuando el Caballero de la noche muera, regresa la carta de criatura objetivo con coste de maná convertido de 3 o menos de tu cementerio al campo de batalla.

foreignNames.name: Cavalier de la nuit
foreignNames.text:
Lien de vie
Quand le Cavalier de la nuit arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez sacrifier une autre créature. Quand vous faites ainsi, détruisez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle.
Quand le Cavalier de la nuit meurt, renvoyez sur le champ de bataille une carte de créature avec un coût converti de mana inférieur ou égal à 3 ciblée depuis votre cimetière.

foreignNames.name: Cavalcante della Notte
foreignNames.text:
Legame vitale
Quando il Cavalcante della Notte entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi sacrificare un'altra creatura. Quando lo fai, distruggi una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario.
Quando il Cavalcante della Notte muore, rimetti sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura bersaglio con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 3 dal tuo cimitero.

foreignNames.name: 夜の騎兵
foreignNames.text:
絆魂
夜の騎兵が戦場に出たとき、あなたは他のクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げてもよい。そうしたとき、対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
夜の騎兵が死亡したとき、あなたの墓地から点数で見たマナ・コストが３以下のクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それを戦場に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル・騎士

foreignNames.name: 한밤의 기수
foreignNames.text:
생명연결
한밤의 기수가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 다른 생물 한 개를 희생할 수 있다. 그렇게 할 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
한밤의 기수가 죽을 때, 당신의 무덤에 있는 전환마나비용이 3 이하인 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Cavaleiro Noturno
foreignNames.text:
Vínculo com a vida
Quando Cavaleiro Noturno entra no campo de batalha, você pode sacrificar outra criatura. Quando fizer isso, destrua a criatura alvo que um oponente controla.
Quando Cavaleiro Noturno morrer, devolva o card de criatura alvo com custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a 3 de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha.

foreignNames.name: Всадник Ночи
foreignNames.text:
Цепь жизни
Когда Всадник Ночи выходит на поле битвы, вы можете пожертвовать другое существо. Когда вы это делаете, уничтожьте целевое существо под контролем оппонента.
Когда Всадник Ночи умирает, верните целевую карту существа с конвертированной мана-стоимостью не более 3 из вашего кладбища на поле битвы.

foreignNames.name: 暮夜骁骑
foreignNames.text:
系命
当暮夜骁骑进战场时，你可以牺牲另一个生物。当你如此作时，消灭目标由对手操控的生物。
当暮夜骁骑死去时，将目标总法术力费用等于或小于3的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

foreignNames.name: 暮夜驍騎
foreignNames.text:
繫命
當暮夜驍騎進戰場時，你可以犧牲另一個生物。當你如此作時，消滅目標由對手操控的生物。
當暮夜驍騎死去時，將目標總魔法力費用等於或小於3的生物牌從你的墳墓場移回戰場。

cards.originalText:
Lifelink
When Cavalier of Night enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. When you do, destroy target creature an opponent controls.
When Cavalier of Night dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Disfigure
cards.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Let this serve as a reminder of your failure."
—Exdratha, bog witch

foreignNames.name: Entstellen
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -2/-2 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Damit du dich für immer an dein Versagen erinnerst."
—Exdratha, Sumpfhexe

foreignNames.name: Desfigurar
foreignNames.text: La criatura objetivo obtiene -2/-2 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Que esto sirva como recuerdo de tu fracaso".
—Exdratha, bruja de la ciénaga

foreignNames.name: Défiguration
foreignNames.text: La créature ciblée gagne -2/-2 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Que ceci vous rappelle à jamais votre échec. »
—Exdratha, sorcière des marécages

foreignNames.name: Sfigurare
foreignNames.text: Una creatura bersaglio prende -2/-2 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Che questo ti serva a ricordare il tuo fallimento."
—Exdratha, fattucchiera della palude

foreignNames.name: 見栄え損ない
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－２/－２の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor:
「これをあなたの失敗のしるしとしましょう。」
――沼の魔女、エクスドラーサ

foreignNames.name: 외형 손상
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -2/-2를 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"이게 네 실패를 되새겨 주게 될 거야."
—늪지 마녀, 엑스드라사

foreignNames.name: Desfigurar
foreignNames.text: A criatura alvo recebe -2/-2 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Que isso sirva de recordação de seu fracasso."
— Exdratha, bruxa do pântano

foreignNames.name: Обезобразить
foreignNames.text: Целевое существо получает -2/-2 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Пусть это послужит тебе напоминанием о неудаче».
— Эксдрата, болотная ведьма

foreignNames.name: 毁容
foreignNames.text: 目标生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor:
「用这疤痕来让你永远铭记这次失败。」
～腐沼巫婆艾卓莎

foreignNames.name: 毀容
foreignNames.text: 目標生物得-2/-2直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor:
「用這疤痕來讓你永遠銘記這次失敗。」
～腐沼巫婆艾卓莎

cards.originalText: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Dread Presence
cards.text:
Whenever a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Dread Presence deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: It beckons silently, waiting in the darkness.

rulings.text: A Swamp is a land with the subtype Swamp, not any land with a mana ability that produces black mana.

If you choose the second mode and the chosen target is an illegal target by the time Dread Presence’s triggered ability tries to resolve, the ability doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain 2 life, and the ability won’t change to the first mode.

foreignNames.name: Grauenhafte Präsenz
foreignNames.text:
Immer wenn ein Sumpf unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eines —
• Du ziehst eine Karte und verlierst 1 Lebenspunkt.
• Die Grauenhafte Präsenz fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu und du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: Wartend in der Dunkelheit winkt sie dir still zu.

foreignNames.name: Presencia terrorífica
foreignNames.text:
Siempre que un Pantano entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, elige uno:
• Robas una carta y pierdes 1 vida.
• La Presencia terrorífica hace 2 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo y tú ganas 2 vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: Hace señas en silencio, esperando en la oscuridad.

foreignNames.name: Présence effroyable
foreignNames.text:
À chaque fois qu'un marais arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, choisissez l'un —
• Vous piochez une carte et vous perdez 1 point de vie.
• La Présence effroyable inflige 2 blessures à n'importe quelle cible et vous gagnez 2 points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Elle vous appelle en silence, patiemment dans les ténèbres.

foreignNames.name: Presenza Terrificante
foreignNames.text:
Ogniqualvolta una Palude entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, scegli uno —
• Pesca una carta e perdi 1 punto vita.
• La Presenza Terrificante infligge 2 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio e tu guadagni 2 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: Lancia richiami silenziosi, restando in attesa nell'oscurità.

foreignNames.name: 戦慄の存在
foreignNames.text:
沼が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、以下から１つを選ぶ。
• あなたはカードを１枚引き、あなたは１点のライフを失う。
• クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。戦慄の存在はそれに２点のダメージを与え、あなたは２点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ナイトメア
foreignNames.flavor: 無言で合図し、闇の中で待つ。

foreignNames.name: 공포스러운 존재감
foreignNames.text:
늪이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 하나를 선택한다 —
• 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑고 생명 1점을 잃는다.
• 원하는 목표를 정한다. 공포스러운 존재감은 그 목표에게 피해 2점을 입히고 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그것은 어둠 속에서 기다리며 조용히 손짓한다.

foreignNames.name: Presença Medonha
foreignNames.text:
Toda vez que um Pântano entrar no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, escolha um —
• Você compra um card e perde 1 ponto de vida.
• Presença Medonha causa 2 pontos de dano a qualquer alvo e você ganha 2 pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Ela chama silenciosamente, aguardando na escuridão.

foreignNames.name: Жуткая Сущность
foreignNames.text:
Каждый раз, когда Болото выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, выберите одно —
• Вы берете карту и теряете 1 жизнь.
• Жуткая Сущность наносит 2 повреждения любой цели, а вы получаете 2 жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: Она манит тебя, ожидая в темноте, не говоря ни слова.

foreignNames.name: 颤栗鬼影
foreignNames.text:
每当一个沼泽在你的操控下进战场时，选择一项～
•你抓一张牌且你失去1点生命。
•颤栗鬼影对任意一个目标造成2点伤害，且你获得2点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 它在黑暗之中静静等待，悄然回应。

foreignNames.name: 顫慄鬼影
foreignNames.text:
每當一個沼澤在你的操控下進戰場時，選擇一項～
•你抽一張牌且你失去1點生命。
•顫慄鬼影對任意一個目標造成2點傷害，且你獲得2點生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 它在黑暗之中靜靜等待，悄然回應。

cards.originalText:
Whenever a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Dread Presence deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor: Resistance is unthinkable.

foreignNames.name: Zwang
foreignNames.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst davon eine Karte, die weder eine Kreatur noch ein Land ist. Der Spieler wirft die bestimmte Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: Widerstand ist undenkbar.

foreignNames.name: Coacción
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra ni criatura. Ese jugador descarta esa carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Resistirse es impensable.

foreignNames.name: Contrainte
foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous y choisissez une carte non-créature non-terrain. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Toute résistance est inconcevable.

foreignNames.name: Costrizione
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra, non creatura da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Opporre resistenza è impensabile.

foreignNames.name: 強迫

cards.name: Embodiment of Agonies
cards.text:
Flying, deathtouch
Embodiment of Agonies enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each different mana cost among nonland cards in your graveyard. (For example, {2}{B} and {1}{B}{B} are different mana costs.)
cards.flavor: "I feel your pain. It's exquisite."

rulings.text: Every Magic card has either no mana cost or exactly one mana cost. A card with no mana cost is never counted by Embodiment of Agonies. A card with a mana cost of {0} is counted.
Embodiment of Agonies checks the mana symbols in a card’s mana cost. For example, a mana cost of {X} is different than a mana cost of {0}.
Hybrid mana symbols are treated as the actual symbols, not as either of their two components individually. For example, {B/R}, {B}, and {R} are three different mana costs.
The mana cost of a split card is determined by its two halves combined. For example, the mana cost of Fire//Ice in your graveyard is {2}{U}{R}, the same as the mana cost of Ral’s Outburst.
Alternative costs, additional costs you could pay, cost increases, and cost reductions are all ignored by Embodiment of Agonies.
If you return Embodiment of Agonies from your graveyard to the battlefield, its last ability counts itself.

cards.name: Epicure of Blood
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
cards.flavor: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."

rulings.text: The ability of Epicure of Blood triggers just once for each life-gaining event, whether it’s 1 life from Impassioned Orator or 4 life from Dawning Angel. If you gain an amount of life “for each” of something or “equal to the number” of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability of Epicure of Blood triggers only once.

Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, Epicure of Blood’s ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won’t cause the ability to trigger, even though it caused your team’s life total to increase.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Epicure of Blood’s ability causes the opposing team to lose 1 life twice.
